label: Name:YURIE
value: 尤里改
translated: Yuri Prime

label: Name:CYURI
value: 心灵部队
translated: Psychic Troops

label: Name:TQU
value: 天权
translated: Tianquan

label: Name:CHINAFLAG
value: 中国国旗
translated: Chinese Flag

label: Name:AD11
value: 苏联红军不可战胜
translated: The Soviet Red Army is invincible

label: Name:AD12
value: 伟大的革命领袖斯大林
translated: Great revolutionary leader Stalin

label: Name:AD13
value: 加入保卫祖国的光荣行列
translated: Join us to defend the motherland with glory

label: Name:AD14
value:
富强、民主、文明、和谐
自由、平等、公正、法治
爱国、敬业、诚信、友善
translated: <Translator Note: Socialist Core Value>

label: Name:ATH01
value: 巴特农神庙
translated: Parthenon

label: Name:ATH02
value: 胜利女神像
translated: Statue of Victory

label: Name:PWRX
value: 停电信标
translated: Blackout Beacon

label: Name:TITAN
value: 泰坦机甲
translated: Titan

label: Name:TINSY
value: 北海巨妖
translated: Kraken

label: LDY:0
value: 林德拉克计划 - 尤里篇：命运之瞳的觉醒
translated: Rynderack Project - Yuri: Awakening of the Eye of Fate

label: LDC:0
value: 林德拉克计划 - 中国篇：巨龙的奋力一击
translated: Rynderack Project - China: The Dragon's Mighty Blow

label: LDY:C001
value: 希腊，雅典。
translated: Athens, Greece.

label: LDY:C002
value: 「尤里： “看来这里集结的就是欧盟的全部主力部队了？”」
translated: Yuri: "It seems that the entire EU forces is gathered here?"

label: LDY:C003
value: 「尤里： “哦，真是方便呢。正好可以一网打尽。”」
translated: Yuri: "Oh, that's convenient. Just catch them all in one go."

label: LDY:C004
value: 教徒，主人需要你去找到并摧毁欧盟最具威胁的战争机器。
translated: Proselyte, the Master needs you to find and destroy the EU's most threatening war machine.

label: LDY:C005
value: 我们的部队已经在爱琴海集结。先在雅典卫城登陆并建立一座基地。
translated: Our troops have been assembled in the Aegean Sea. Land on the Acropolis and build a base.

label: LDY:C006
value: 任务目标 - 清理登陆区并建立一座基地。
translated: Mission Objective - Clear the landing zone and establish a base.

label: LDY:HEasy
value: 难度 - 休闲
translated: Difficulty - Casual

label: LDY:HMid
value: 难度 - 正常
translated: Difficulty - Normal

label: LDY:HHard
value: 难度 - 脑死
translated: Difficulty - Brain Dead

label: LDC:HEasy
value: 难度 - 休闲
translated: Difficulty - Casual

label: LDC:HMid
value: 难度 - 正常
translated: Difficulty - Normal

label: LDC:HHard
value: 难度 - 长征
translated: Difficulty - Long March

label: LDY:ZCtrl
value: --作战控制连线--
translated: --Battle Control Online--

label: LDC:ZCtrl
value: --作战控制连线--
translated: --Battle Control Online--

label: LDY:C007
value: 丧失关键部队 - 基地车被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - mobile construction vehicle destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:C008
value: 教徒，这是尤里改，主人至高心灵力量接近完美的克隆体。
translated: Proselyte, this is Yuri Prime, a near-perfect clone of the master's supreme psychic power.

label: LDY:C009
value: 他们可以利用心灵力量悬浮着漂洋过海，或者从更远的距离支配敌人。
translated: They can levitate across water or mind control enemies from greater distances.

label: LDY:C010
value: 已成功建立基地。等待主人的下一步指示。
translated: The base has been established. Waiting for the further instructions from the master.

label: LDY:C011
value: 「尤里： “这些愚蠢的人们相信他们的神能够带领他们取得胜利。把它化为一堆瓦砾吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "These foolish people believe their gods can lead them to victory. Reduce them to rubble."

label: LDY:C012
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁胜利女神像。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the Statue of Victory.

label: LDY:C013
value: 「尤里： “还有这两台战争机器，最好帮我弄回来，弄不回来就摧毁掉。”」
translated: Yuri: "For these two war machines, it's best to bring them back for me. If not, destroy them."

label: LDY:C014
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁或控制北海巨妖和泰坦机甲。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy or mind-control the Kraken and Titan.

label: LDY:C015
value: 「尤里： “这台超时空传送器也很麻烦……你知道该做什么的，教徒。”」
translated: Yuri: "This Chronosphere is also troublesome... You know what to do, proselyte."

label: LDY:C016
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁超时空传送仪。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the Chronosphere.

label: LDY:C017
value: 警告 - 检测到巨大的能量场！
translated: Warning - Massive power surge detected!

label: LDY:C018
value: 警告 - 静滞力场已启动！
translated: Warning - Immobilization Field activated!

label: LDY:C019
value: 教徒，我们的电力崩溃，空军坠毁，陆军无法移动，通讯也中断了！
translated: Proselytes, our power is down, our air force is lost, our army can't move, and communications are down!

label: LDY:C020
value: 能检测到能量是从这座实验室里发出来的。这应该就是他们最后的王牌了，摧毁它！
translated: Energy can be detected coming from this laboratory. This should be their last trump card, destroy it!

label: LDY:C022
value: 动力和通讯已经恢复。注意静滞力场似乎正在重新充能，我们该抓紧时间了。
translated: Power and communications have been restored. Note that the Immobilization Field still appears to be recharging, it's time to hurry.

label: LDY:C023
value: 注意 - 静滞力场还有1分钟启动！
translated: Attention - Immobilization Field activates in 1 minute!

label: LDY:C024
value: 基因突变器被毁，需要重新建造才能继续使用。
translated: The Genetic Mutator was destroyed and needs to be rebuilt.

label: LDY:C025
value: 当基因突变器重新建立，我们就可以立刻重新为它的武器充能了。
translated: Once the Genetic Mutator is rebuilt, we can immediately recharge this weapon.

label: LDY:C026
value: 教徒，尤里改已经可以通过兵营来训练。
translated: Proselytes, Yuri Prime can be trained through the barracks.

label: LDY:C027
value: 虽然他们价格昂贵，但是这些投入绝对是值得的。
translated: Although they are expensive, the investment is definitely worth it.

label: LDY:C028
value: 「尤里： “愚蠢的人们啊，你们已经不再需要神庙。忘掉过去，供奉我作为新的神吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "Foolish people, you need no temple. Forget the past and worship me as your new god."

label: LDY:C029
value: 提示 - 这座武器工厂可以降低车辆、舰船和防御建筑的生产成本。
translated: Hint - This weapon factory reduces the production cost of vehicles, ships and defensive structures.

label: LDY:C030
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁起源科技实验室。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the Origin Technology Laboratory.

label: LDY:C031
value: 注意 - 欧盟启动了力场护盾来保护他们的关键建筑。
translated: Attention - The EU has activated force shields Protect their key structures.

label: LDY:C032
value: 警告 - 欧盟舰队正在集结！
translated: Warning - the EU fleet is gathering!

label: LDY:C033
value: 干得漂亮，教徒。你已经解决了威灵顿的基地。
translated: Well done, Proselyte. You've taken care of Wellington's base.

label: LDY:C034
value: 麦斯维尔的基地被摧毁了，他手下的部队不会再抵抗太久的。
translated: Maxwell's base was destroyed. His troops wouldn't hold out much longer.

label: LDY:C035
value: 起源科技实验室被摧毁，静滞力场已被关闭。
translated: The Origin Technology Laboratory has been destroyed and the immobilization field has been shut down.

label: LDY:C036
value: 我们现在可以毫无顾忌的使用镭射幽浮了。
translated: We can now use floating discs without any worries.

label: LDY:C037
value: 教徒，我必须提醒你。
translated: Proselyte, I must warn you.

label: LDY:C038
value: 如果你没有做好摧毁起源科技实验室的准备，它发射的静滞力场能直接击落战场上的所有镭射幽浮。
translated: If you are not prepared to destroy the Origin Technology Laboratory, the immobilization field it launches will destroy all floating discs.

label: LDY:C039
value: 泰坦机甲的威胁已经解除。
translated: The threat from the Titan has been eliminated.

label: LDY:C040
value: 北海巨妖的威胁已经解除。
translated: The threat from the Kraken has been eliminated.

label: LDY:C041
value: 超时空传送仪被摧毁，超时空传送已关闭。
translated: The Chronosphere was destroyed.

label: LDY:C042
value: 注意 - 欧盟正在向雅典城区传送装甲部队。
translated: Attention - The EU is sending armored troops to the city of Athens via Chronosphere.

label: LDY:C043
value: 「尤里： “欧盟的军事力量已经被几乎完全摧毁，没有人能够阻止我们在欧洲大陆的攻势了。”」
translated: Yuri: "The EU's forces has almost been wiped out. Nobody can stop our assult on the European continent."

label: LDY:C044
value: 「尤里： “剩下的敌人已经不足以妨碍我的计划。很快，他们也将服从于我。”」
translated: Yuri: "The remaining enemies are no longer a threat. Soon, they too will obey me."

label: LDY:C045
value: 更多的镭射幽浮已经到达。
translated: More floating discs have arrived.

label: LDC:D001
value: 中国，绵阳核子研究中心。
translated: Mianyang Nuclear Research Center, China.

label: LDC:D002
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（11x倍速）

label: Name:EOF
value: 命运之瞳
translated: Eye of Fate

label: LDY:DE001
value: 「尤里附加任务 - 倒戈」
translated: Yuri Hidden Mission - Mutiny

label: LDY:DE002
value: 英国，利物浦。
translated: Liverpool, UK.

label: LDY:D001
value: 法国，巴黎。
translated: Paris, France.

label: LDY:A001
value: 苏联，列宁格勒。
translated: Leningrad, Soviet Union.

label: LDY:B001
value: 乌克兰，塞瓦斯托波尔。
translated: Sevastopol, Ukraine.

label: LDY:E001
value: 日本，福井。
translated: Fukui, Japan.

label: LDY:DE003
value: 教徒，欧盟把他们的这两台战争机器就这样拱手送给了我们。
translated: Proselyte, the EU gave us these two war machines.

label: LDY:DE004
value: 既然这样，就多陪他们玩一玩吧。
translated: In this case, just have some fun with them.

label: LDY:DE005
value: 任务目标 - 消灭在利物浦的英国部队。
translated: Mission Objective - Eliminate British troops in Liverpool.

label: LDY:DE006
value: 提示 - 泰坦机甲能够使用汲取光束吸收敌人的能量，以恢复自身的装甲。
translated: Hint - The Titan can use a drain beam to restore its hit point.

label: LDY:DE007
value: 提示 - 命令北海巨妖锁定那艘战列舰，就可以轻松对付它。
translated: Hint - Order the Kraken to lock onto that battleship to easily deal with it.

label: LDY:DE008
value: 注意 - 一支苏联部队正在利物浦建立基地。他们似乎和英国人达成了同盟。
translated: Attention - Soviet forces is building a base in Liverpool. They seemed to allied with the British.

label: LDY:DE009
value: 任务目标 - 消灭在利物浦的苏联部队。
translated: Mission Objective - Eliminate Soviet troops in Liverpool.

label: LDY:DE010
value: 提示 - 命令泰坦机甲在空闲时攻击路边的建筑物，以使用汲取光束恢复装甲。
translated: Hint - Order the Titan to attack buildings to restore hit points using the drain beam.

label: LDY:DE011
value: 提示 - 命令北海巨妖在水中行动，这样可以有效的避开敌人地面部队的攻击。
translated: Hint - Order the Kraken to move in the water, to effectively avoid attacks of enemy ground troops.

label: LDY:DE012
value: 丧失关键部队 - 泰坦机甲被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Titan destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:DE013
value: 丧失关键部队 - 北海巨妖被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Kraken destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:HExtra
translated: Difficulty - ???

label: LDY:DE014
value: 这些苏联人很碍事，主人命令你顺便也消灭他们。
translated: These Soviets are a annoying, and the master orders you to eliminate them as well.

label: LDY:DE015
value: 任务目标 - 泰坦机甲和北海巨妖不能被摧毁。
translated: Mission Objective - Titan and Kraken cannot be destroyed.

label: LDY:DE016
value: 注意 - 检测到英国人的巨炮阵地！
translated: Attention - British Grand Cannon emplacement detected!

label: LDY:DE017
value: 已成功摧毁一座英国人的基地。
translated: Successfully destroyed a British base.

label: LDY:DE018
value: 已成功摧毁苏联人的基地。
translated: Successfully destroyed the Soviet base.

label: LDY:DC
value: 欧洲战场已经告一段落，是时候实施下一步计划了。
translated: The battle in European has come to an end. It is time for the next move.

label: LDY:CC
value: 我们在雅典一举全歼了欧盟的主力部队，这让他们所谓的希望化为泡影。
translated: We wiped out the main EU forces in Athens in one fell swoop, dashing their so-called hopes.

label: LDY:EC
value:
很好，在这场博弈中，只有我们是赢家。
命运之瞳已经在福井就绪，准备飞向北极点。
translated:
Very good, we are the only winners in this game.
The Eye of Fate is ready in Fukui, ready to fly to the North Pole.

label: LDY:FC
value:
命运之瞳成功进入北极圈，现在只等好消息了……
……
translated:
The Eye of Fate successfully entered the Arctic Circle. Now we are just waiting for the good news...
...

label: LDY:GC
value:
最大的麻烦——天枢，已经被除掉了。
可是，下一步计划是什么呢……
translated:
The biggest threat, Tianshu, has been eliminated. 
But, what is the next move...

label: LDY:AC
value:
绝大多数的苏联高层人物都已经在我们的掌握之中了。
他们都臣服于尤里的意志，为尤里主人而服务。
translated:
Most of the top Soviet figures are already under our control.
They all surrendered to Yuri's will and served Master Yuri.

label: LDY:BC
value:
我们让林德拉克逃掉了，不过他的部下已经被我们悉数消灭。
现在他只是光杆司令了，看起来情况还不坏。
translated:
Rynderack has escaped, but all his men were wiped out.
Now that he's on his own, things don't look too bad.

label: LDC:A001
value: 中国，雅鲁藏布江大峡谷。
translated: Brahmaputra Valley, China.

label: LDC:B001
value: 苏联，符拉迪沃斯托克。
translated: Vladivostok, Soviet Union.

label: LDC:C001
value: 中国，澳门。
translated: Macao, China.

label: LDC:DE001
value: 中国附加任务 - 「破碎的红莲花」
translated: China Hidden Mission - Broken Red Lotus

label: LDC:E001
value: 韩国，釜山。
translated: Pusan, South Korea.

label: LDC:F001
value: 日本，名古屋。
translated: Nagoya, Japan.

label: LDC:G001
value: 北极冰盖。
translated: Arctic ice cap.

label: LDC:AC
value:
来自天枢的加密消息已经回传。
突击队员天权，请注意自身安全，随时待命。完毕。
translated:
The encrypted message from Tianshu has been transmitted.
Commando Tianquan, please pay attention to your own safety and standby. Over.

label: LDC:BC
value:
我们已经确认了同尤里进行交易的危险性，我们会立刻终止与尤里的合作并加以警惕。
突击队员天权，请立刻动身转移至东北战区，以准备应对可能的事变。完毕。
translated:
We have realized the danger of trading with Yuri. We will immediately stop working with Yuri and be vigilant.
Commando Tianquan, please move to the Northeast Theater to prepare for possible incidents. Over.

label: LDC:CC
value:
林德拉克帮助我们阻止了尤里在澳门使心灵信标过载的计划。
突击队员天权，随时注意筛查人员，防止尤里对我情报网络的渗透。完毕。
translated:
Rynderack helped us prevented the Psychic Beacon from overloading in Macau.
Commando Tianquan, always pay attention to screening personnel, to prevent Yuri from infiltrating our intelligence network. Over.

label: LDC:DC
value:
一代又一代人为着祖国前赴后继，我们是不会让他们白白牺牲的。
突击队员天权，立即乘坐直升机前往韩国釜山准备执行任务。完毕。
translated:
Generations of people have fought for the motherland. We will not let their sacrifices be in vain.
Commando Tianquan, took the helicopter immediately to Pusan in South Korea to prepare for the mission. Over.

label: LDC:EC
value:
我们成功的夺取了有关尤里“最终意志”计划的机密资料，并重创了尤里的海军力量。
突击队员天权，请即刻动身前往名古屋同林德拉克会面。完毕。
translated:
We captured confidential information about Yuri's plan - "The Final Spirit" and severely crippled Yuri's naval power.
Commando Tianquan, please leave immediately for Nagoya to meet with Rynderack. Over.

label: LDC:FC
value:
我们成功挫败了尤里的泰坦机甲量产计划，并解密了有关命运之瞳的一些信息。
突击队员天权，请做好前往北极作战的准备，这会是我们最后的一战。完毕。
translated:
We successfully thwarted Yuri's Titan mass production and decrypted some information about the Eye of Fate.
Commando Tianquan, please prepare to fight in the Arctic. This will be our last battle. Over.

label: LDC:GC
value:
战争结束了。我们获得了，或者说至少暂时获得了和平。
突击队员天权，你已获准休假。你现在可以随时前往塘沽基地办理休假手续。完毕。
translated:
The war is over. We had peace, or at least temporarily.
Commando Tianquan, you have been granted leave. You can take your vacation anytime from Tanggu base. Over.

label: LDY:DE019
value: 我们成功了！教徒！英国人和苏联人被他们自己所研制的战争机器打的抱头鼠窜。
translated: We succeeded! Proselyte! The British and the Soviets were overwhelmed by the war machines they developed.

label: LDY:DE020
value: 这充分说明了：一切战争机器都是工具，只有尤里的意志才是永恒的。
translated: This all illustrates that, all war machines are tools, and only Yuri's will is eternal.

value: FarthestEnd - 削除
translated: TODO

label: Name:AD15
value: 澳门首家线上赌场上线啦！
translated: Macau's first online casino is now online!

label: Name:AD16
value: 要兔子吗？
translated: Want a rabbit?

label: Name:AD17
value: Explosion！
translated: Explosion!

label: Name:AD18
value: 你可真是个小天使
translated: You are such a little angel

label: Name:AD19
value: 屯屯屯屯屯屯屯
translated: tun tun tun tun tun tun tun

label: Name:AD20
value: 工作996，生病ICU
translated: Work 996, sick in ICU

label: LDY:C046
value:
武器工厂
防御建筑造价降低20%
战车舰船造价降低20%
translated:
Weapons Factory
Reduce the cost of Defense structure by 20%
Reduce the cost of vehicles and ships reduced by 20%

label: LDY:A002
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “这是胜利的一天！我们伟大祖国母亲的荣耀！”」
translated: Romanov: "This is a day of victory! The glory of our great motherland!"

label: LDY:A003
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “我们的敌人已经不复存在，整个世界都会被苏维埃的光辉所笼罩。”」
translated: Romanov: "Our enemy no longer exists, and the whole world will be enveloped in the glory of the Soviet Union."

label: LDY:A004
value: 教徒，如你所见，愚蠢的罗曼诺夫在这里召开了盛大的胜利日阅兵庆祝活动。
translated: Proselyte, as you can see, stupid Romanov is holding a Victory Day parade here.

label: LDY:A005
value: 可是他没有料到，欧盟并没有被击败，他们已经集结部队准备来搅局了。
translated: But he didn't expect that the EU had not been defeated. They are already preparing an assult.

label: LDY:A006
value: 我们英明的主人认为罗曼诺夫没有能力领导这个国家，他和他的走狗们应该在阅兵结束后接受我们的审判。
translated: Our wise masters believe that Romanov is incapable of leading this country. He and his men should face our trial after the parade.

label: LDY:A007
value: 可是这要等他们到齐。这需要一些时间。
translated: But that will have to wait until they all arrive. This will take some time.

label: LDY:A008
value: 在此之前，罗曼诺夫不希望他伟大的阅兵仪式受到干扰。让他开心。
translated: Until then, Romanov did not want his great military parade to be disrupted. Make him happy.

label: LDY:A009
value: 苏联高级官员到齐预估时间
translated: Estimated time for senior Soviet officials to arrive

label: LDY:A010
value: 任务目标 - 保证阅兵式不被干扰。
translated: Mission Objective - Ensure that the military parade is not disrupted.

label: LDY:A011
value: 提示 - 派遣任意步兵进入生化反应炉，可以提高生化反应炉提供的电力。
translated: Hint - Send any infantry into the bio-reactor to increase the power output.

label: LDY:A012
value: 提示 - 修复复制中心以增加步兵克隆速度。
translated: Hint - Capture the cloning vat to increase infantry production rate.

label: LDY:A013
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “该死……欧盟部队怎么来了？弗拉基米尔、尤里，帮我挡住他们！”」
translated: Romanov: "Damn... why are EU forces here? Vladimir, Yuri, help me stop them!"

label: LDY:A014
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “我伟大的阅兵式不能被这样毁了！”」
translated: Romanov: "My great military parade cannot be ruined like this!"

label: LDY:A015
value: 注意 - 城中可能有间谍活动。要提防他们对电力系统的破坏。
translated: Caution - There may be spys in the city. Beware of their sabotage to the electrical system.

label: LDY:A016
value: 提示 - 我们为你派来了额外的伞兵部队。
translated: Hint - We've got extra paratroopers for you.

label: LDY:A017
value: 警告 - 不要派你的部队闯入阅兵区域，否则会直接导致我们的计划败露！
translated: Warning - Do not send your troops into the parade area, otherwise our plan will be exposed!

label: LDY:A018
value: 警告 - 欧盟部队正在闯入阅兵区域！不能让他们得逞！
translated: Warning - EU forces are invading the parade area! We can't let them succeed!

label: LDY:A019
value: 未能达成目标 - 我方部队干扰了阅兵，任务失败。
translated: Objective failed - our troops interfered with the parade, mission failed.

label: LDY:A020
value: 未能达成目标 - 欧盟部队干扰了阅兵，任务失败。
translated: Objective failed - EU troops disrupted the parade, mission failed.

label: LDY:A021
value:
救世主滴血大教堂
罗曼诺夫总理的驻地
关键目标，不可摧毁
translated:
Cathedral of the Savior on Spilled Blood
Premier Romanov's residence
Critical Structure, DO NOT DESTROY

label: LDY:A022
value: 冬宫
translated: Hermitage

label: LDY:A023
value: 注意 - 受阅部队的先头队伍已经接近阅兵核心区域。
translated: Attention - The leading group of troops being reviewed has approached the core area of the parade.

label: LDY:A024
value: 教徒！你在干什么！主人的命令明明是要使用心灵信标控制总理，你却杀了他！
translated: Proselyte! What are you doing! The master's order was to use a psychic beacon to control the Premier, but you killed him!

label: LDY:A025
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 救世主滴血大教堂被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - the Cathedral of the Savior on Spilled Blood was destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:A026
value: 警告 - 欧盟部队正在从涅瓦河沿水路进攻。
translated: Warning - EU forces are attacking along the waterway from the Neva River.

label: LDY:A027
value: 总理的近卫军会挡住他们的舰船，但你要提防他们的登陆部队。
translated: The Chancellor's Guards will hold off their ships, but you'll want to watch out for their landing forces.

label: LDY:A028
value: 提示 - 有一支额外的坦克部队从涅瓦河大桥而来。利用好它们！
translated: Hint - there is an extra tank force coming from the Neva Bridge. Take advantage of them!

label: LDY:A029
value: 苏联高级官员
translated: Senior Soviet Official

label: LDY:A030
value: 未能达成目标 - 阅兵受到干扰，任务失败。
translated: Objectives failed - the parade was disrupted, mission failed.

label: LDY:A031
value: 注意 - 欧盟派出了遥控坦克参与对列宁格勒的进攻。这种机器无法被心灵控制。
translated: Attention - The EU sent robot tanks to attack on Leningrad. This type of tank cannot be mind controlled.

label: LDY:A032
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “尤里！你在干什么！”」
translated: Romanov: "Yuri! What are you doing!"

label: LDY:A033
value: 「弗拉基米尔： “我的防线快撑不下去了！快支援我，尤里！”」
translated: Vladimir: "I can't hold the line anymore! Help me, Yuri!"

label: LDY:A034
value: 好的，教徒，看样子苏联的高级官员都已经到达了。
translated: Okay, proselytes, it looks like all senior Soviet officials have arrived.

label: LDY:A035
value: 接下来我们要使用一名工程师启动这座心灵信标，控制他们的心智。
translated: Next, we need to use an engineer to activate this psychic beacon and control their minds.

label: LDY:A036
value: 但请注意，我们一旦闯入阅兵区域，一定会引起罗曼诺夫的警觉，并可能受到警卫队的攻击。
translated: But please note that once we get into the parade area, we will alert Romanov and may be attacked by the guards.

label: LDY:A037
value: 所以请多加小心，教徒。
translated: So please be careful, proselytes.

label: LDY:A038
value: 任务目标 - 使用工程师启动心灵信标。
translated: Mission Objective - Use the Engineer to activate the Psychic Beacon.

label: LDY:A039
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “尤里做出了未授权的行动！全体戒备，准备应对可能的状况！”」
translated: Romanov: "Yuri took an unauthorized action! Everyone is on alert and prepared to deal with possible situations!"

label: LDY:A040
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 心灵信标被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Psychic Beacon destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:A041
value: 工程师已经成功进入心灵信标，心灵信标准备启动……
translated: The engineer has successfully entered the psychic beacon. The psychic beacon is ready to be activated...

label: LDY:A042
value: 「尤里： “意志羸弱的罗曼诺夫不足以领导这个强大的国家！我们的计划就从这里开始吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "The weak-willed Romanov is incapable to lead this country! Our plan starts here."

label: LDY:A043
value: 丧失关键部队 - 苏联高级官员遇袭，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Senior Soviet officials are attacked, mission failed.

value: Saika - Rabpit
translated: TODO

label: THEME:WindItUp
value: Wind It Up - John Stanford
translated: TODO

value: One Hundred Hunters - John Stanford
translated: TODO

value: Automatica - John Stanford
translated: TODO

value: Step Into Infinity - Alwone
translated: TODO

label: Name:SCANNON
value: 塞瓦斯托波尔要塞炮
translated: the cannon of Sevastopol Fortress

label: LDY:B002
value: 教徒，我们的登陆部队已经抵达。
translated: Proselyte, our landing force has arrived.

label: LDY:B003
value: 心灵观测显示，林德拉克可能不仅仅是在塞瓦斯托波尔度假那么简单，他似乎已经洞悉了我们的计划。
translated: Rynderack may be more than just vacationing in Sevastopol. He seemed to know our plans.

label: LDY:B004
value: 他一定会尝试把他的资料从港口运出，通过空运或者海运。
translated: He will definitely try to get his resources out of the port, by air or sea.

label: LDY:B005
value: 主人要你彻底封锁这座港口，连一只苍蝇都不能逃出去！
translated: The master wants you to completely block this port so that not even a fly can escape!

label: LDY:B006
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁所有船坞，并击沉港口内所有货轮。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy all shipyards and sink all cargo ships in the port.

label: LDY:B007
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁或占领机场，并摧毁港口内所有运输直升机。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy or capture the airport and destroy all transport helicopters in the port.

label: LDY:B008
value: 任务目标 - 不能让任何一艘货轮或运输直升机离开港口。
translated: Mission Objective - Prevent cargo ships or transport helicopter from leaving the port.

label: LDY:B009
value: 注意 - 有一艘货轮从船坞出发了，请时刻注意它的动向！
translated: Attention - A cargo ship has set off from the dock. Please pay attention to its movements!

label: LDY:B010
value: 注意 - 有一架运输直升机从机场出发了，请时刻注意它的动向！
translated: Attention - A transport helicopter is departing from the airport. Please pay attention to its movements!

label: LDY:B011
value: 警告 - 一艘货轮正在逃离港口！如果它逃脱了，任务就失败了！
translated: Warning - A cargo ship is leaving the port! The mission would fail should it escap!

label: LDY:B012
value: 警告 - 一架运输直升机正在逃离港口！如果它逃脱了，任务就失败了！
translated: Warning - A transport helicopter is leaving the port! The mission would fail should it escap!

label: LDY:B013
value: 未能拦截目标 - 有一艘货轮逃离了港口，任务失败。
translated: Failed to intercept target - A cargo ship escaped from the port, mission failed.

label: LDY:B014
value: 未能拦截目标 - 有一架运输直升机逃离了港口，任务失败。
translated: Failed to intercept target - A transport helicopter escaped from the port, mission failed.

label: LDY:B015
value: 注意 - 林德拉克已经启用了塞瓦斯托波尔要塞的古老大炮。
translated: Attention - Rynderack has activated the cannon of Sevastopol Fortress.

label: LDY:B016
value: 虽然是十分古老的武器，但它们仍然威胁巨大。远离它们，或者尽早解决掉它们吧。
translated: Although it's an old weapon, they are still a huge threat. Stay away, or get rid of them.

label: LDY:B017
value: 警告 - 大批苏联坦克部队正在附近集结！快使用神经突击车让他们自相残杀。
translated: Warning - A large number of Soviet tanks are massing nearby! Use the Chaos Drones to make them kill each other.

label: LDY:B018
value: 提示 - 依据主人的指示，更多的雷鸣潜艇正在赶来协助封锁港口。
translated: Hint - Per the master's instructions, more Boomer submarines are arriving to help blockade the port.

label: LDY:B019
value: 下一次脱逃行动预估时间
translated: Estimated time for next escape

label: LDY:B020
value: 教徒，我们会随时关注他们的心灵，并尝试给出他们进行下一次脱逃行动的预估时间。
translated: Proselytes, we will keep an eye on their minds and try to give them an estimated time for their next escape attempt.

label: LDY:B021
value: 塞瓦斯托波尔机场已经陷落，苏联人没办法再发送雌鹿运输直升机了。
translated: Sevastopol airfield had fallen. Soviets could no longer send Hind transport helicopters.

label: LDY:B022
value: 已经成功摧毁了一座船坞。
translated: A shipyard has been successfully destroyed.

label: LDY:B023
value: 塞瓦斯托波尔已经不再有船坞，这座港口事实上成为死港。
translated: Sevastopol no longer has shipyard. The port has become a de facto dead port.

label: LDY:B024
value: 所有的雌鹿运输直升机都已经被摧毁。
translated: All Hind transport helicopters have been destroyed.

label: LDY:B025
value: 所有的货轮都已经被击沉。
translated: All cargo ships have been sunk.

label: LDY:B026
value: 等等！教徒，这里，我们还漏掉了一艘船！
translated: Wait! Proselytes, we missed a ship!

label: LDY:B027
value: 「林德拉克： “到刚才为止你还干得不错，但是，到此为止吧。我要乘这艘船离开这里。”」
translated: Rynderack: "You have done well so far, but let's stop here. I'm taking this ship out of here."

label: LDY:B028
value: 警告 - 林德拉克使用铁幕保护了货轮！
translated: Warning - Rynderack protects the ship with the Iron Curtain!

label: LDY:B029
value: 该死，只能这么让他逃掉了吗……
translated: Damn it, we have to let him escape...

label: LDY:B030
value: 我方部队全部被消灭，任务失败。
translated: All our troops were wiped out, mission failed.

value: MEGALOBOX - Mabauna
translated: TODO

label: LDY:A044
value: 注意 - 更多的欧盟部队正在进入超时空传送器，很快就会有更多的坦克部队进入列宁格勒郊区。
translated: Attention - More EU troops are entering the Chronosphere. More tanks will be entering the outskirts of Leningrad soon.

label: LDY:A045
value: 「弗拉基米尔： “妈的，谁把电闸拉了！我的防御建筑都没法运行了！”」
translated: Vladimir: "Damn it, who pulled the breaker! None of my defensive structures are working!"

label: LDY:A046
value: 「弗拉基米尔： “在城里抓奸细这种事是你的事，你最好给我好好用心！”」
translated: Vladimir: "It's your responsibility to catch spies in the city. You'd better pay attention!"

label: LDY:A047
value: 提示 - 使用部队回收厂回收更多被控制的敌人单位以获取资金。
translated: Hint - Use the Grinder to recycle mind-controlled enemy units for funds.

label: LDY:A048
value: 警告 - 我们感应到大量光棱坦克进入了欧盟的超时空传送器！
translated: Warning - We sense a large number of Prism Tanks entering the EU's Chronosphere!

label: LDY:A049
value: 欧盟正在集结部队做最后一搏，他们快要失败了！
translated: The EU is gathering forces for a last attempt. They are about to fail!

label: LDY:A050
value: 注意 - 罗曼诺夫正在命令他的警卫队和弗拉基米尔的部队攻击我们！
translated: Attention - Romanov is ordering his guards and Vladimir's troops to attack us!

label: LDY:A051
value: 「罗曼诺夫： “任何人都要对我永远忠诚，否则结局就是死亡！”」
translated: Romanov: "Everyone must be loyal to me forever, otherwise the consequence is death!"

label: LDY:A052
value: 「尤里： “哦，那就看看到底该对谁忠诚吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "Oh, let's see who we should be loyal to."

label: Name:CIND01
value: 污水处理池
translated: Sewage Treatment Tank

label: Name:CIND02
value: 风力发电机
translated: Wind Turbines

label: Name:CIND03
value: 太阳能电池板
translated: Solar Panels

label: Name:CIND05
value: 风源
translated: Wind power

label: Name:PARAYURI
value: 心灵空投
translated: Psychic Paradrop

label: Name:PARACAOS
value: 混乱空投
translated: Chaos Paradrop

label: LDY:C047
value: 胜利女神尼姬已经化为一堆瓦砾。在主人的意志面前，没有什么神能够庇护他们了。
translated: Niki, the goddess of victory, has been reduced to rubble. In the face of the master's will, no god can protect them.

label: LDY:C048
value: 我方部队不敌欧盟部队，进入撤退程序……
translated: Our troops were defeated by the EU troops. Proceed to withdraw...

label: THEME:RedCrisis
value: Red Crisis - Heli
translated: TODO

label: Name:NACLC
value: 征召中心
translated: Recruitment Center

label: Name:MACAU01
value: 大三巴牌坊
translated: Ruins of St. Paul's

label: Name:MACAU03
value: 新葡京酒店
translated: Grand Lisboa Hotel

label: Name:MACAU04
value: 澳门塔
translated: Macau Tower

label: LDY:D002
value: 欧洲的仅剩反抗势力龟缩在巴黎，但是他们龟缩不了多久了。
translated: The only remaining resistance in Europe were huddled in Paris. But they could not stay there for long.

label: LDY:D003
value: 巴黎的城市防御十分坚固，尤其有这些大炮环绕四周。
translated: The city of Paris is very well defended, especially with these cannons surrounding it.

label: LDY:D004
value: 主人并不想为此浪费太多兵力。我们应该渗透这座城市，让他们在无声中消失。
translated: The master does not want to waste too many troops. We should infiltrate the city and make them disappear silently.

label: LDY:D005
value: 渗透小队已经抵达。善用他们，教徒。
translated: The infiltration team has arrived. Use them wisely, proselytes.

label: LDY:D006
value: 任务目标 - 渗透整座城市，并消灭所有城防部队。
translated: Mission Objective - Infiltrate the city and eliminate all city defense forces.

label: LDY:D007
value: 提示 - 我们似乎可以想办法渡过塞纳河，来寻找更多的突破口。
translated: Hint - It seems that we can find a way to cross the Seine to find more breakthroughs.

label: LDY:D008
value: 警告 - 我们的尤里复制人和病毒狙击手都无法对付这些碉堡。避开它们。
translated: Warning - Our Yuri clones and virus snipers are useless against these bunkers. Avoid them.

label: LDY:D009
value: 提示 - 避开这些在塞纳河巡逻的遥控坦克，或者摧毁它们的控制中心让它们失效。
translated: Hint - Avoid these robot tanks patrolling the Seine, or disable them by destroying their control centers.

label: LDY:D010
value: 提示 - 尝试使用敌人的生产设施训练间谍切断他们的电力，然后我们的总攻部队就可以安全到达。
translated: Hint - Try to use the enemy's production facilities to train spies to cut off their power. Then our attack force can arrive safely.

label: LDY:D011
value: 教徒，对这座城市的总攻部队已经准备就绪。
translated: Proselyte, the attack force on this city is ready.

label: LDY:D012
value: 我们的支援武器也已经上线。务必善加利用它们，你将不会获得更多的支援了。
translated: Our support weapons are also online. Be sure to take advantage of them. Yyou won't get any additional support.

label: LDY:D013
value: 渗透小队全灭，任务失败。
translated: The infiltration team was completely wiped, mission failed.

label: LDY:D014
value: 我们已经做好了切断防御部队电力的准备。
translated: We are ready to cut off power to the defense forces.

label: LDY:D015
value: 教徒，我们的心灵感测范围已经覆盖了整个巴黎。现在他们的一举一动都在我们的注视下了。
translated: Proselyte, our psychic sensing has covered the entire Paris. Now their every move is under our watchful eye.

label: LDY:D016
value: 呃，我想，那边会是一个不错的登陆地点。
translated: Well, I thought, that would be a good place to land.

label: LDY:D017
value: 那座作战实验室应该会帮上大忙，想办法占领它吧。
translated: That battle laboratory should be of great help. Let's find a way to capture it.

label: LDY:D018
value: 这里好像正在发生一场火灾。我们还没有进攻，他们就自乱阵脚了吗？
translated: There seems to be a fire going on here. Did they get into chaos before we even attacked?

label: Name:PARS12
value: 巴黎圣母院
translated: Notre Dame de Paris

label: LDY:D019
value: 这里有许多集中的敌人，让他们尝尝病毒传染的滋味吧。
translated: There are many enemies concentrated here, let them taste the virus infection.

label: LDY:D020
value: 注意 - 敌人警戒等级提升，他们会出动更多的部队搜索城内的破坏者。
translated: Attention - Enemy alert level increases. They will dispatch more troops to search for saboteurs in the city.

label: LDY:D021
value: 注意 - 敌人警戒等级提升，他们会出动主力部队搜索城内的破坏者。
translated: Attention - Enemy alert level increases. They will actively dispatch troops to search for saboteurs in the city.

label: LDY:D022
value: 注意 - 敌人警戒等级提升，他们会出动空军部队搜索城内的破坏者。
translated: Attention - Enemy alert level increases. They will dispatch air units to search for saboteurs in the city.

label: LDY:D023
value: 注意 - 敌人警戒等级提升，他们会出动高科技部队搜索城内的破坏者。
translated: Attention - Enemy alert level increases. They will dispatch high-tech units to search for saboteurs in the city.

label: LDY:D024
value: 我们已经攻陷了巴黎的最后防线，欧洲的最后一点反抗力量也被抹平了。
translated: We have broken the last line of defense in Paris. The last bit of resistance in Europe has been wiped out.

label: LDY:D025
value: 至于剩下的残兵败将们，主人肯定会仁慈的接受他们的投降，然后把他们送进部队回收厂吧。
translated: As for the remains, the master will definitely accept their surrender and send them to the grinder.

label: LDY:D026
value: 控制中心被摧毁，敌人的遥控坦克都无法行动了。
translated: The control center was destroyed, the enemy's robot tanks offline.

label: LDY:D027
value: 提示 - 塞纳河附近防御薄弱，尝试在这个方向寻找敌人的破绽。
translated: Hint - The defenses near the Seine are weak, try to find an opening in this direction.

label: LDY:D028
value: 高卢人傲慢的象征——埃菲尔铁塔，也已经在熊熊烈火中不复存在了。
translated: The Eiffel Tower, the symbol of Gaulish arrogance, ceased to exist in the blazing fire.

label: LDY:D029
value: 凯旋？是他们的末日才对吧。
translated: Triumph? This is the end of them, right?

label: LDY:E002
value: 警告 - 检测到中国巡航导弹来袭！
translated: Warning - Incoming Chinese cruise missile detected!

label: LDY:E003
value: 教徒，我们的主人正在这里和日本人进行一笔交易。
translated: Proselyte, our master is making a deal with the Japanese here.

label: LDY:E004
value: 日本人会帮助我们研发一项秘密科技，而我们许诺提供我们的基因武器进行交换。
translated: The Japanese will help us develop a secret technology, and we promise to provide our genetic weapons in exchange.

label: LDY:E005
value: 心灵探测显示，中国舰队正在日本海集结，他们的目标可能就是福井。
translated: Psychic sensing shows that the Chinese fleet is gathering in the Sea of Japan. Their target may be Fukui.

label: LDY:E006
value: 一旦心灵控制器被毁，我们的计划就全泡汤了。
translated: Should the Psychic Dominator be destroyed, all our plans would be ruined.

label: LDY:E007
value: 任务目标 - 保护心灵控制器，直到新科技研发完成。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect the Psychic Dominator until new technology is developed.

label: LDY:E008
value: 新科技研发预估时间
translated: Estimated time for new technology R&D

label: LDY:E009
value: 显然，我们的主人并不想把基因技术这样轻易交给日本人。
translated: Obviously, our masters do not want to hand over genetic technology to the Japanese so easily.

label: LDY:E010
value: 研发完成后的最优选择，还是把他们也一起干掉。
translated: After the R&D is completed, the best option is to kill them too.

label: LDY:E011
value: 不过我们最好缓一缓再动手，毕竟他们还能作为抵挡中国人的炮灰。
translated: But we'd better take it slow. After all, they can still be used as cannon fodder to resist the Chinese.

label: LDY:E012
value: 警告 - 检测到更多巡航导弹来袭！
translated: Warning - More incoming cruise missiles detected!

label: LDY:E013
value: 教徒，我们必须准备充足的防空力量来对付这些长程飞弹。
translated: Proselyte, we must prepare sufficient air defense to deal with these long-range missiles.

label: LDY:E014
value: 随着中国人对战场信息的测绘，他们的巡航导弹一定会越来越准确的击中目标。
translated: As the Chinese maps the battlefield, their cruise missiles will surely be more accurate.

label: LDY:E015
value: 警告 - 中国军队正在出动海蝎来掩护潜艇的进攻！
translated: Warning - The Chinese military is sending out Sea Scorpions to cover submarine attacks!

label: LDY:E016
value: 警告 - 我们的雷达被黑客侵入了！我们失去了对战场的心灵感测！
translated: Warning - Our radar has been hacked! We've lost psychic reveal on the battlefield!

label: LDY:E017
value: 「天枢： “就是这里！瞄准点，给我炸了那座心灵控制器！”」
translated: Tianshu: "Here it is! Aim here and blow up that Psychic Dominator for me!"

label: LDY:E018
value: 警告 - 中国正在福井工业区南部发动登陆作战！
translated: Warning - China is landing at the south of the Fukui Industrial District!

label: LDY:E019
value: 警告 - 中国人已经在福井南部建立了基地！
translated: Warning - the Chinese have established a base south of Fukui!

label: LDY:E020
value: 警告 - 更多的中国坦克部队正在福井南部集结！
translated: Warning - More Chinese tanks are massing south of Fukui!

label: LDY:E021
value: 「天枢： “里面的日本朋友，听好了！整座港口已经完全被中国潜艇包围了！”」
translated: Tianshu: "Japanese friends inside, listen up! The entire port has been completely surrounded by Chinese submarines!"

label: LDY:E022
value: 「天枢： “尤里是我们共同的敌人。只要调转枪口攻击尤里的下属，你们就是我们的朋友！”」
translated: Tianshu: "Yuri is our common enemy. As long as you turn your guns against Yuri, you will be our friends!"

label: LDY:E024
value: 「天枢： “没有回应。那么，开始全面进攻吧！”」
translated: Tianshu: "No response. So, let's start attack!"

label: LDY:E025
value: 我们已经可以建造尤里雕像来防御基地。
translated: We can already build Yuri statues to defend the base.

label: LDY:E026
value: 它的每一束目光都聚集了主人的意志，可以对远距离的敌人造成重创。
translated: Each of its gaze concentrates the master's will, inflicting heavy damage to enemies from a distance.

label: LDY:E027
value: 新科技已经成功研发完成。
translated: New technology has been successfully developed.

label: LDY:E028
value: 「天枢： “那……那他妈的是什么玩意？”」
translated: Tianshu: "Oh...what the hell is that?"

label: LDY:E029
value: 教徒，这就是我们主人的杰作，飞行的心灵控制器——「命运之瞳」。
translated: Proselytes, this is the masterpiece of our master, the flying psychic dominator - "Eye of Fate".

label: LDY:E030
value: 警告 - 福井港口检测到水下敌人！
translated: Warning - Underwater enemies detected in Fukui Port!

label: LDY:E031
value: 警告 - 检测到大型空中目标！
translated: Warning - Large aero target detected!

label: LDY:E032
value: 「尤里： “去吧，教徒，用命运之瞳击毁他们最后的希望。”」
translated: Yuri: "Go, proselytes, use the Eye of Fate to destroy their last hope."

label: LDY:E033
value: 「尤里： “我们没有盟友，也不需要盟友。让他们在命运的审判中哀嚎吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "We have no allies and we don't need them. Let them wail in the judgment of their fate."

label: LDY:E034
value: 注意 - 我们几乎可以确信日本人会在研发完成以后向我们开火。请做好与他们决裂的准备。
translated: Attention - We are almost certain that the Japanese will open fire on us once development is completed. Be prepared to deal with them.

label: LDY:E035
value: 「天枢： “停止对日本人开火！让我们一起对付那个大家伙！”」
translated: Tianshu: "Stop firing on the Japanese! Let's deal with that big thing together!"

label: LDY:E036
value: 「天枢： “停止发射巡航导弹，撤走舰队！我们需要更多的防空力量支援！”」
translated: Tianshu: "Stop launching cruise missiles and withdraw the fleet! We need more anti air support!"

label: LDY:E037
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 心灵控制器被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Psychic Dominator destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:E038
value: 丧失关键单位 - 命运之瞳被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Eye of Fate destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:E039
value: 提示 - 命运之瞳可以心灵控制多个敌方地面或空中单位，并从中汲取能量修复自身损伤。
translated: Hint - The Eye of Fate can mind control multiple enemy ground or air units and self-repair in the process.

label: LDY:E040
value: 提示 - 部署命运之瞳，会在其正下方产生猛烈的心灵震荡波，造成不分敌友的伤害。
translated: Hint - Deploy the Eye of Fate will generate a violent psychic shockwave directly below it, causing damage regardless of friend or foe.

label: LDY:E041
value: 「尤里： “最精妙的杰作也顺利完成了，现在我的计划只剩最后一部分了。”」
translated: Yuri: "The most exquisite masterpiece has been successfully completed, and now only the last step of my plan remains."

label: LDY:F001
value: 苏联，新西伯利亚。
translated: Novosibirsk, Soviet Union.

label: LDY:G001
value: 中国，墨脱。
translated: Medog, China.

label: LDY:G002
value: 心灵感应监测到大量中国军队在此地集结。
translated: Psychic sensing detects a large number of Chinese troops gathering here.

label: LDY:G003
value: 教徒，命运之瞳因为被黑客入侵而无法启动，而中国黑客天枢公开声称对此事件负责。
translated: Proselyte, the Eye of Fate was hacked and cannot be activated. The Chinese hacker Tianshu publicly claimed responsibility for the incident.

label: LDY:G004
value: 主人无法容忍这样的挑衅行为。他命令我们尽快除掉天枢。
translated: The master cannot tolerate such provocative behavior. He ordered us to get rid of Tianshu ASAP.

label: LDY:G005
value: 如果心灵感应观测的结果没有错，那么天枢一定就藏在雅鲁藏布江大峡谷。
translated: If the Psychic sensing results are correct, Tianshu must be hidden in the Brahmaputra Valley.

label: LDY:G006
value: 我们的入侵部队已经到达。
translated: Our invasion force has arrived.

label: LDY:G007
value: 任务目标 - 找到并杀死天枢。
translated: Mission Objective - Find and kill Tianshu.

label: LDY:E042
value: 任务目标 - 消灭所有敌对势力。
translated: Mission Objective - Eliminate all hostile forces.

label: LDY:F002
value: 教徒，按照我们主人的计划，命运之瞳需要穿过西伯利亚，径直飞向北极点。
translated: Proselyte, according to our master's plan, the Eye of Fate needs to fly through Siberia and directly to the North Pole.

label: LDY:F003
value: 但心灵感测发现，林德拉克已经在路上建立防线等着我们了。
translated: But Psychic sensing showed that Rynderack had already set up a defensive line on the road waiting for us.

label: LDY:F004
value: 「尤里： “不要让我的计划受到任何阻碍。撕碎他们的防线，为我扫清道路。”」
translated: Yuri: "Don't let anything hinders my plan. Tear apart their defenses and clear the way for me."

label: LDY:F005
value: 任务目标 - 等待命运之瞳到达，并集结一支部队。
translated: Mission Objective - Assemble an army and wait for the Eye of Fate to arrive.

label: LDY:F006
value: 任务目标 - 护送命运之瞳通过此区域。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort the Eye of Fate through this area.

label: LDY:F007
value: 命运之瞳到达预估时间
translated: Estimated arrival time of the Eye of Fate

label: LDY:F008
value: 注意 - 命运之瞳会径直朝北极点飞去，请确保你的部队跟得上它。
translated: Attention - The Eye of Fate will fly straight towards the North Pole, make sure your troops can keep up with it.

label: LDY:F009
value: 战术空投系统已经上线。现在你可以快速的空投新兵和尤里复制人到前线。
translated: The tactical airdrop system is now online. Now you can quickly airdrop initiates and Yuri clones to the frontline.

label: LDY:F010
value: 更多的援军正在抵达新西伯利亚。
translated: More reinforcements are arriving in Novosibirsk.

label: LDY:F011
value: 命运之瞳的心灵控制武器系统已经上线。
translated: The Psychic Dominator on the Eye of Fate online.

label: LDY:F012
value: 注意 - 林德拉克又启动了一座铁幕装置！
translated: Attention - Rynderack has activated another Iron Curtain device!

label: LDY:E043
value: 福井港口的所有的敌对势力都已经被肃清。
translated: All hostile forces in Fukui Port have been eliminated.

label: LDY:E044
value: 教徒，我们还没来得及隔离入侵心灵探测器的黑客程序，现在建造多座心灵探测器毫无用处。
translated: Proselytes, it's useless to build multiple psychic radars until we can isolate the hacks.

label: LDY:E045
value: 化工厂
translated: Chemical Plant

label: LDY:F013
value: 这片区域无法部署基地车，教徒。继续向城区推进寻找合适的地点。
translated: Mobile Construction Vehicle cannot be deployed in this area, proselytes. Continue to move into the city to find a suitable location.

label: LDY:F014
value: 基地已部署。请尽快集结一支部队以做好护送命运之瞳的准备。
translated: MCV deployed. Please assemble a force ASAP to be ready to escort the Eye of Fate.

label: LDY:F015
value: 「林德拉克： “好的，四座铁幕装置已经同步运行了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Okay, four Iron Curtain devices have been running simultaneously."

label: LDY:F016
value: 「林德拉克： “现在该让敌人尝尝我们的厉害了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Now it's time to let the enemy have a taste of our power."

label: LDY:F017
value: 「“我们遇到什么困难，也不要怕！”」
translated: "Don't be afraid of any difficulties we encounter!"

label: LDY:F018
value: 「“微笑着面对它！”」
translated: "Face it with a smile!"

label: LDY:F019
value: 「“消除恐惧的最好办法，就是面对恐惧！”」
translated: "The best way to eliminate fear is to face it!"

label: LDY:F020
value: 「“坚持，才是胜利！ 加油！ 奥里给！ ！ ！”」
translated: "Persistence is victory! Come on!"

label: LDY:F021
value: 已摧毁一座铁幕装置。
translated: An Iron Curtain device has been destroyed.

label: LDY:F022
value: 警告 - 命运之瞳正在受到猛烈的攻击！
translated: Warning - The Eye of Fate is under heavy attack!

label: LDY:F023
value: 警告 - 命运之瞳快要撑不住了！一旦它被摧毁，任务就失败了！
translated: Warning - Eyes of Destiny is about to burst! Should it be destroyed, the mission would failed!

label: LDY:F024
value: 最后一批护航的镭射幽浮部队已经抵达。
translated: The last escort of Floating Discs has arrived.

label: LDY:F025
value: 命运之瞳已经抵达战场。
translated: The Eye of Fate has arrived on the battlefield.

label: LDY:F026
value: 「尤里： “我们所剩时间不多了。教徒，击破他们的防线，让命运之瞳安全通过。”」
translated: Yuri: "We don't have much time left. Proselytes, break through their defenses and let the Eye of Fate pass safely."

label: LDY:F027
value: 丧失关键单位 - 命运之瞳被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Eye of Fate destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDY:F028
value: 「林德拉克： “该死……我失败了，我没能拦住他们。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Damn it... I failed, I couldn't stop them."

label: LDY:F029
value: 「林德拉克： “全靠你了，天枢。”」
translated: Rynderack: "It's all up to you, Tianshu."

label: LDY:F030
value: 「林德拉克： “不！不！！！”」
translated: Rynderack: "No! No!!!"

label: LDY:DP001
value: 罗马尼亚，德古拉要塞。
translated: Romania, Dracula's Fortress.

label: LDY:DP002
value: 教徒，心灵感应器检测到主人的护卫队出现了异常。
translated: Proselyte, the psychic radar detected something abnormal in the master's guard.

label: LDY:DP003
value: 他们似乎不完全效忠于主人！我们必须尽快前去解围！
translated: They don't seem to be loyal to their master! We must go to the rescue ASAP!

label: LDY:DP004
value: 一旦主人被杀死了，一切就全完了！！
translated: Once the master is killed, everything is over!!

label: LDY:DP005
value: 「尤里： “外面好吵闹啊。还是让我来亲自收拾场面吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "It's so noisy outside. Let me clean things up myself."

label: LDY:DP006
value: 提示 - 尤里X可以从远距离对单位和建筑物进行心灵控制，但是无法控制遥控坦克等机器人单位。
translated: Hint - Yuri Prime can mind control units and buildings from a distance, but he cannot control robotic units such as robot tanks.

label: LDY:DP007
value: 提示 - 收集一些仍然忠于主人的部队，可能会为突击行动帮上忙。
translated: Hint - Gathering some troops who are still loyal to their master. It may help in the assult.

label: LDY:DP008
value: 任务目标 - 前往德古拉要塞支援。
translated: Mission Objective - Go to Dracula's Fortress to support.

label: LDY:DP009
value: 任务目标 - 护送尤里X到达集结点。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort Yuri Prime to the assembly point.

label: LDY:DP010
value: 任务目标 - 尤里X不能阵亡。
translated: Mission Objective - Keep Yuri Prime alive.

label: LDY:DP011
value: 注意 - 叛变的亲卫队已经开始大举进攻德古拉要塞了！
translated: Attention - The renegade guards has begun a massive assult on Dracula's Fortress!

label: LDY:DP012
value: 「尤里： “你们知道吗，背叛是要付出代价的。”」
translated: Yuri: "You know, there is a price to pay for betrayal."

label: LDY:DP013
value: 「尤里： “一旦走上背叛之路，要么交出你们的鲜血，要么交出你们的灵魂，除此之外没有别的选择。”」
translated: Yuri: "Once you embark on the road of betrayal, you will pay with either your blood or your soul. There is no other choice."

label: LDY:DP014
value: 教徒，我们正在联系附近仍然忠于主人的所有部队前来支援。
translated: Proselytes, we are contacting all nearby troops still loyal to our masters to come to our aid.

label: LDY:DP015
value: 先前往德古拉要塞支援，然后我们会尝试把主人带出来。
translated: Go to Dracula's Fortress for support first, and then we'll try to bring the master out.

label: LDY:DP016
value: 注意 - 检测到大量超时空传送部队！
translated: Attention - Massive teleported troops from Chronosphere detected!

label: LDY:DP017
value: 「威灵顿： “欧盟的最后作战力量已经到达。这回真的是孤注一掷了。”」
translated: Wellington: "EU's last forces has arrived. This time it's all-or-nothing."

label: LDY:DP018
value: 「威灵顿： “我想办法说服了一些尚未被完全心灵控制的敌人，调转枪口和我们一同作战。”」
translated: Wellington: "I managed to convince some enemies who were not yet mind-controlled to turn their guns and fight with us."

label: LDY:DP019
value: 「威灵顿： “这是自由世界的最后一搏了！只要杀死尤里，一切就都结束了！”」
translated: Wellington: "This is the last stand of the free world! Just kill Yuri and everything will be over!"

label: LDY:G008
value: 「天枢： “唔，尤里的走狗，没想到你们居然会跟到这里来。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Well, Yuri's lackeys, I didn't expect you to follow me here."

label: LDY:G009
value: 「天枢： “既然来了，那自然就要为你们准备一份大礼。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Since you are here, I will prepare a gift for you."

label: LDY:G010
value: 警告 - 天枢启动了一座核弹发射井！
translated: Warning - Tianshu activated a nuclear silo!

label: LDY:G011
value: 警告 - 天枢启动了另一座核弹发射井！
translated: Warning - Tianshu activated another nuclear silo!

label: LDY:G012
value: 警告 - 检测到黑客入侵！
translated: Warning - Hacking detected!

label: LDY:G013
value: 「天枢： “你们的资金管理程序的加密也太弱了吧。我正好需要借来些军费用用，多谢了啊。”」
translated: Tianshu: "The security of your asset management system is weak. I just need to borrow some money, thank you very much."

label: LDY:G014
value: 「天枢： “所谓的心灵感应雷达也就是那么回事嘛……我先发送些垃圾数据过去。”」
translated: Tianshu: "That's what the so-called psychic radar is... I'll DDoS it first."

label: LDY:G015
value: 「天枢： “像这种把总电源调用接口开关暴露在外的安防程序，还是真少见呢……”」
translated: Tianshu: "It's rare to see a security program that exposes the main power switch outside..."

label: LDY:G016
value: 警告 - 天枢骇入了我们的资金管理程序。金钱被转走50%。
translated: Warning - Tianshu hacked our asset management system. 50% of the money was transferred away.

label: LDY:G017
value: 警告 - 天枢骇入了我们的心灵感应雷达。失去雷达视野66秒。
translated: Warning - Tianshu hacked our psychic radar. Loss of radar vision for 66 seconds.

label: LDY:G018
value: 警告 - 天枢骇入了我们的电力设施。电力中断66秒。
translated: Warning - Tianshu hacked our electrical infrastructure. Power offline for 66 seconds.

label: LDY:G019
value: 「天枢： “哦对，多亏你借给我们的技术，我们已经开始训练自己的心灵部队了。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Oh yes, thanks to the technology you provided, we have begun training our own psychic troops."

label: LDY:G020
value: 「天枢： “所以看到你的部队自相残杀的时候，也不要太过惊讶。”」
translated: Tianshu: "So don't be too surprised when you see your troops killing each other."

label: LDY:F031
value: 「尤里： “结束了。已经没有任何力量可以阻止命运之瞳进入北极了。”」
translated: Yuri: "It's over. There is nothing to stop the Eye of Fate from entering the North Pole."

label: LDY:G021
value: 教徒，这里地势不利，建议我们把基地建筑延伸至高地。
translated: Proselyte, the terrain here is unfavorable. We should extend the buildings to higher ground.

label: LDY:G022
value: 出现了！天枢在那里！杀了他！！！
translated: Tianshu is there! kill him!!!

label: LDY:G023
value: 「天枢： “我突然感到无比轻松……身上背负的可怕的重担，终于可以放下了吧。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I suddenly felt extremely relaxed... The terrible burden I was carrying could finally be let go."

label: LDY:G024
value: 「天枢： “尤里，你听好了，你的罪行会随着我的死讯传遍整个世界，没有人……”」
translated: Tianshu: "Yuri, listen carefully, your crime will spread throughout the world with my death. No one..."

label: LDY:G026
value: 「尤里： “他死了。我们撤退吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "He's dead. Let's retreat."

label: LDY:G027
value: 「尤里： “没必要和中国军队过多纠缠，我们还是把主要精力放在如何修复命运之瞳上吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "There is no need to further struggle with the Chinese army. Let's focus on how to repair the Eye of Fate."

label: Name:TSUD
value: 天枢的尸体
translated: Tianshu Body

label: LDY:G028
value: 天枢已经成功被刺杀。
translated: Tianshu has been successfully assassinated.

label: LDY:G029
value: 我方部队全部被消灭，任务失败。
translated: All our troops were wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDY:DP020
value: 「盖特坦克： “我们会誓死为主人效忠！”」
translated: Gattling Tank: "We will swear allegiance to our master to the death!"

label: LDY:DP021
value: 丧失关键单位 - 尤里X阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Yuri Prime was killed, mission failed.

label: LDC:A002
value: 「天权： “我已经抵达墨脱市区。这里看来发生过激烈的战斗。有什么情报吗？”」
translated: Tianquan: "I have arrived in the urban area of Medog. It appears that a fierce battle took place here. Any update?"

label: LDC:A003
value: 「清芷： “毫无头绪。我们只知道这里有三座基地受到了不明势力的袭击。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Negative. We only know that three bases here have been attacked by unknown forces."

label: LDC:A004
value: 「清芷： “一有任何战术信息我会立刻通知你，但请你也保持警惕。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I will notify you immediately as soon as I have any update. Please remain vigilant."

label: LDC:A005
value: 「天权： “该死……希望我没来的太晚。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Damn... I hope I didn't come too late."

label: LDC:A006
value: 任务目标 - 调查失联的三座基地。
translated: Mission Objective - Investigate three missing bases.

label: LDC:A007
value: 提示 - 天权驾驶着轻型车辆行动，可以使用步枪瞄准并射击敌人的步兵。
translated: Hint - Tianquan drives a light vehicle and can use his rifle to target enemy infantry.

label: LDC:A008
value: 「清芷： “天权，你已经有了为巡航导弹标记打击目标的权限。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Tianquan, you are authorized to mark targets for cruise missiles."

label: LDC:A009
value: 「清芷： “一旦位置确定，我们会发射巡航导弹，帮你炸平敌人的建筑或者坦克小队。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Once the location is determined, we will launch cruise missiles to help you blow up enemy's buildings or tank squads."

label: LDC:A010
value: 「清芷： “当心狙击手！你的轻型车辆没法为你提供比较好的保护，但可以为你提供速度优势。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Beware of snipers! Your light vehicle won't provide much protection, but at least it's maneuverabile."

label: LDC:D003
value: 尤里似乎早早就盯上了我们位于绵阳的核工业中心。
translated: Yuri seems to have set his sights on our nuclear industry center in Mianyang for a long time.

label: LDC:D004
value: 十倍于我们的敌人正在附近集结。时间只够我们转移科研人员，只能背水一战了。
translated: Enemies ten times our size are gathering nearby. We only have enough time to evacuate research personnel. We have no choice but to fight against the odds.

label: LDC:D005
value: 等等，天子仁将军在线上。他有话要和你讲。
translated: Wait, General Tianziren is online. He has something to tell you.

label: LDC:D006
value: 「天子仁： “既然我们已经没有退路，我倒是有一个大胆的想法。”」
translated: Tianziren: "Since we have no retreat, I have a bold idea."

label: LDC:D007
value: 「天子仁： “就是利用这些快中子注入装置，转化大量的钚-239，制造一场大爆炸，与敌人同归于尽。”」
translated: Tianziren: "Using these reactors to produce a large amount of plutonium-239, we can create an explosion to perish together with the enemy."

label: LDC:D008
value: 「天子仁： “敌人似乎不想摧毁这些设备，而是占领它们。这就是我们的机会。”」
translated: Tianziren: "They don't want to destroy these devices, but to capture them. This is our chance."

label: LDC:D009
value: 「天子仁： “不论代价如何，我觉得可以这样试试看。”」
translated: Tianziren: "No matter what the cost, I think you can give it a try."

label: LDC:D010
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until a sufficient amount of plutonium is produced.

label: LDC:D011
value: 任务目标 - 不能让尤里占领任何一座快中子注入装置。
translated: Mission Objective - Prevent Yuri from capturing any fast neutron reactor.

label: LDC:D012
value: 注意 - 有几座快中子注入装置在地图上，右下角的剩余时间就会以几倍速度流逝。
translated: Attention - The remaining time will pass at the rate proportional to the number of remaining reactors.

label: LDC:D013
value: 注意 - 敌人不会攻击快中子注入装置，但是会尝试占领它们。当你无法保护时，请亲手炸毁。
translated: Attention - Enemies will attempt to capture reactors rather than attacking them. Please blow them up when you can no longer protect.

label: LDC:D014
value: 提示 - 我们的核武库已经完全解封。你可以建造并使用两座核弹发射井。
translated: Hint - Our nuclear arsenal has been unlocked. You can build and use up to two nuclear silos.

label: LDC:D015
value: 「清芷： “一些装载着核废料的卡车正在赶来。希望它们能够帮助你拖延时间。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Some trucks carrying nuclear waste are coming. Hopefully they will help you to hold."

label: LDC:D016
value: 任务目标 - 引爆所有的快中子注入装置，与敌人同归于尽。
translated: Mission Objective - Detonate all fast neutron reactors and perish together with the enemy.
