label: LDY:DP022
value: 提示 - 敌人的心灵控制塔对已经被心灵控制的单位毫无威胁。
translated: Hint - Enemy Psychic towers pose no threat to units that are already mind controlled.

label: LDY:DP023
value: 警告 - 狂兽人不能被心灵控制。小心对付他们。
translated: Warning - Brutes cannot be mind controlled. Be careful with them.

label: LDY:DP024
value: 教徒，我不认为我们的部队能够攻破桥对岸的防御。应该寻找其它的道路。
translated: Proselyte, I don't think our troops can break through the defenses on the other side of the bridge. We should use other paths.

label: LDY:DP025
value: 注意 - 德古拉城堡已经被摧毁。
translated: Attention - Dracula's fortress has been destroyed.

label: LDY:DP026
value: 敌人很快就会注意到尤里大人并没有藏在城堡中。请务必保护好他！
translated: The enemy will soon notice that master Yuri is not in the fortress. Please protect him!

label: LDY:DP027
value: 德古拉要塞的严密防御似乎超乎了叛军的想象。
translated: The tight defense of Dracula's Fortress seems to be beyond the imagination of the rebels.

label: LDY:DP028
value: 他们应该会暂停这种无意义的消耗行为，转入封锁阶段。
translated: They will likely suspend this senseless attrition and attempt to the lock it down.

label: LDY:DP029
value: 「尤里： “算了，在接下来的计划中，欧洲战场是无关紧要的。”」
translated: Yuri: "Forget it, in the next plan, the European battlefield is irrelevant."

label: LDY:DP030
value: 「尤里： “接下来我会前往日本。至于这边剩下的杂鱼，就让他们自生自灭吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "I will go to Japan next. As for the remains here, let them fend for themselves."

label: LDC:C002
value: 首长，林德拉克提供的情报没有错，我们在澳门的部队已经被尤里心灵控制了。
translated: Commander, the intel provided by Rynderack is correct. Our troops in Macau have been mind-controlled by Yuri.

label: LDC:C003
value: 这是我们从尤里购买并部署的心灵信标，没想到尤里在其中还留了一手……
translated: This is the psychic beacon we purchased and deployed from Yuri. Unexpectedly, Yuri also had a hand in it...

label: LDC:C004
value: 摧毁它，就能使得一部分的友军部队摆脱心灵控制。
translated: Destroying it will free some friendly troops from mind control.

label: LDC:C005
value: 「林德拉克： “还好事情还没发展到没法收拾的地步，我们来的还不晚。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Fortunately, things haven't gotten out of hand yet, and we're not too late."

label: LDC:C006
value: 「林德拉克： “我们快一点行动吧。一旦心灵信标加大功率，我们怕是也完了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Let's act quickly. Once the psychic beacon amplifies power, we may be doomed."

label: LDC:C007
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁心灵信标，解救基地。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the psychic beacon and rescue the base.

label: LDC:C008
value: 林德拉克受了重伤，暂时无法参与战斗了。
translated: Rynderack was seriously injured and unable to participate in the battle.

label: LDC:C009
value: 我们会送他去治疗，但恐怕要等到下一次军事行动才能看到他了。
translated: We will treat him, but I'm afraid we won't be able to see him until the next operation.

label: LDC:C010
value: 澳门塔
translated: Macau Tower

label: LDC:C011
value: 澳门博物馆
translated: Macau Museum

label: LDC:C012
value: 妈祖庙
translated: Mazu Temple

label: LDC:C013
value: 「清芷： “在澳门市区内检测到更多的心灵信标！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "More Psychic Beacons have been detected in the city of Macau!"

label: LDC:C014
value: 这些心灵信标似乎已经开始准备过载。一旦过载成功，我们就完了。
translated: These Psychic Beacons seem to be preparing for overload. Once the overload is successful, we're doomed.

label: LDC:C015
value: 每摧毁一座心灵信标，都可以拖慢过载进程。我们需要与时间赛跑。
translated: Each Psychic Beacon destroyed can slow down the overload process. We need to race against time.

label: LDC:C016
value: 任务目标 - 阻止心灵信标的过载。
translated: Mission Objective - Prevent the overload of the Psychic Beacon.

label: LDC:A011
value: 「清芷： “那边是什么东西？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "What is that over there?"

label: LDC:A012
value: 「清芷： “我发现了一些遗留在这里的恐怖机器人。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We found some terror drones left here."

label: LDC:A013
value: 「清芷： “现在它们已经可以重新接受指挥，供您调遣。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Now they can be commanded again at your disposal."

label: LDC:A014
value: 「心灵部队： “别开枪！自己人！”」
translated: Psychic Troops: "Don't shoot! Friendly force!"

label: LDC:A015
value: 「清芷： “哦对了，我们利用从尤里购买的技术训练了一批心灵部队。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Oh, by the way, we used the technology purchased from Yuri to train a group of psychic troops."

label: LDC:A016
value: 「清芷： “没想到会在这里遇到，但愿他们能够帮上忙。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I didn't expect to meet them here. But I hope they can help."

label: LDC:A017
value: 「清芷： “巡航导弹飞过来需要些时间，但是你无须在此期间保持一直锁定目标。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It will take some time for the cruise missile to fly over, but you don't have to keep locking on the target."

label: LDC:A018
value: 任务目标 - 护送天权前往通讯中心，把加密信息传出。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort Tianquan to the communication center to send out encrypted information.

label: LDC:A019
value: 「天权： “我……赶到了第一座基地。这里已经化为一片废墟。”」
translated: Tianquan: "I... arrived at the first base. This place has been reduced to rubbles."

label: LDC:A020
value: 「清芷： “真是糟糕的状况……快检查一下有没有什么线索吧。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It's such a bad day... Let's look for clues."

label: LDC:A021
value: 「天权： “这里情况似乎也不妙。”」
translated: Tianquan: "The situation here doesn't seem to be good either."

label: LDC:A023
value: 「天权： “该死……都被摧毁了吗？”」
translated: Tianquan: "Damn it...were they all destroyed?"

label: LDC:A024
value: 「天权： “弟弟！弟弟！！我最好的弟弟天枢！！！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Brother! younger brother!! My best brother Tianshu!!!"

label: LDC:A025
value: 「天权： “这里究竟发生了什么！！回答我！！！”」
translated: Tianquan: "What on earth happened here!! Answer me!!!"

label: LDC:A026
value: 「清芷： “节哀……虽然有些冒犯，但我想你最好翻一翻他身上还有什么随身物品。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "My condolence...Although it's a little offensive, I think you'd better search his belongings."

label: LDC:A027
value: 「清芷： “你的弟弟曾经也是我们国家最好的特工，我相信他会留下一些线索。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Your brother was once our best agent. I believe he will leave some clues."

label: LDC:A028
translated: Tianquan: "..."

label: LDC:A029
value: 「天权： “他的衣服内侧有一块亮闪闪的东西，似乎是被封装好的芯片。”」
translated: Tianquan: "There is a shiny thing on the inside of his clothes, which seems to be a packaged chip."

label: LDC:A030
value: 「清芷： “既然是芯片，我们得想办法读出其中的数据。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We have to find a way to read the data in it."

label: LDC:A031
value: 「清芷： “请把芯片带到最近的通讯中心，从那里把芯片中的数据传回指挥部。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Please take the chip to the nearest communication center, and transmit the data to the command center."

label: LDC:A032
value: 丧失关键单位 - 天权阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Tianquan is killed, mission fails.

label: CRD:LDmifenglangniu
value: 蜜蜂狼牛
translated: TODO

label: LDC:A033
value: 「天权： “这里似乎发生过战斗，但好像是有谁从这里撤退了一样，一干二净。”」
translated: Tianquan: "There seems to be a battle here, but someone retreated from here, nothing left."

label: LDC:A034
value: 「天权： “这样就行了吧？”」
translated: Tianquan: "Is this okay?"

label: LDC:A035
value: 「清芷： “好的。加密数据已经回传，我们情报部门会尽快解读。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Okay. The encrypted data has been sent back. Our intelligence unit will work on it ASAP."

label: LDY:F032
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁北部的铁幕装置和核子反应堆。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the Iron Curtain on the north and the nuclear reactor.

label: LDC:A036
value: 提示 - 天权对于快速移动的坦克无能为力。寻找别的办法，或者避开他们。
translated: Hint - Tianquan is useless against fast moving tanks. Find another way, or avoid them.

label: LDC:B002
value: 我们绝对无法容忍苏联人在哈尔滨采取的军事行动，首长。
translated: We cannot tolerate the military operations taken by the Soviets in Harbin, Commander.

label: LDC:B003
value: 为了先发制人，中央已经下达指示，对此处的苏联远东舰队进行突袭。
translated: To take a preemptive action, the high command has issued order to assult on the Soviet Far East Fleet here.

label: LDC:B004
value: 安磊将军将会负责指挥海军封锁港口，而您负责指挥登陆部队进攻。
translated: General Anlei will be responsible for blocking the port with navy. You will be responsible for commanding the landing troops.

label: LDC:B005
value: 任务目标 - 突袭符拉迪沃斯托克的苏联基地。
translated: Mission Objective - Raid the Soviet base in Vladivostok.

label: LDC:B006
value: 「基洛夫空艇： “谋划战术的阶段已经过去，让我们开始杀戮吧。”」
translated: "Kirov airship: "The planning is over, let's start killing."

label: LDC:B007
value: 提示 - 摧毁此处的两座雷达，然后我们会派出登陆部队。
translated: Hint - Destroy the two radars here and we'll send in a landing force.

label: LDC:B008
value: 登陆点威胁解除，登陆部队即将抵达。
translated: The threat to the landing site has been eliminated. The landing troops is about to arrive.

label: LDC:B009
value: 「林德拉克： “这是怎么回事？停火！停火！！我们是朋友！！！”」
translated: Rynderack: "What's going on? Ceasefire! Ceasefire!! We are friends!!!"

label: LDC:B011
value: 「林德拉克： “该死，完全没有回应！这些中国人是疯了吗！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Damn, no response at all! Are these Chinese crazy?"

label: LDC:B012
value: 提示 - 摧毁这两座雷达，我们会派出更多登陆部队。
translated: Hint - Destroy these two radars. We'll send in more landing troops.

label: LDC:B013
value: 登陆点威胁解除，第二批登陆部队也即将抵达。
translated: The threat to the landing site has been eliminated. The second batch of landing troops is about to arrive.

label: LDC:B014
value: 集结你的部队，准备继续进攻。
translated: Gather your troops and prepare to continue the attack.

label: LDC:B015
value: 「安磊： “那座铁幕装置可能有些麻烦。”」
translated: Anlei: "That Iron Curtain device may be a bit troublesome."

label: LDC:B016
value: 「安磊： “得拜托你先去摧毁它，我们的舰队才能继续攻入港口。”」
translated: Anlei: "You have to destroy it first, so that our fleet can continue to attack the port."

label: LDC:B017
value: 提示 - 摧毁铁幕装置，瓦解苏联的防御。
translated: Hint - Destroy the Iron Curtain device to collapse the Soviet defenses.

label: LDC:B018
value: 已确认铁幕装置被摧毁。
translated: The Iron Curtain device has been destroyed.

label: LDC:B019
value: 「林德拉克： “你们他妈的都疯了吗！尤里大敌当前，我们居然还在这里自相残杀！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Are you all f**king crazy! Yuri is HERE, but we are still here killing each other!"

label: LDC:B020
value: 警告 - 检测到巨大的不明能量！
translated: Warning - Massive power surge detected!

label: LDC:B021
value: 「林德拉克： “完了，太晚了……”」
translated: Rynderack: "It's over, it's too late..."

label: LDC:B022
value: 「清芷： “我这里刚刚接入线路。安磊？能听得到吗？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I just joined the frequency. Anlei? Do you copy?"

label: LDC:B024
value: 「清芷： “安磊？安磊？？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Anlei? Anlei? ?"

label: LDC:B025
value: 「清芷： “发生了什么？有人解释一下吗？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "What happened? Can someone explain?"

label: LDC:B026
value: 「林德拉克： “虽然刚才你们一直以为我是敌人，但现在请你们相信我。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Although you have always thought that I was your enemy, please trust me now."

label: LDC:B027
value: 「清芷： “等一下，你是……林德拉克？还真是难以相信呢……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Wait, are you... Rynderack? It's really hard to believe..."

label: LDC:B028
value: 「林德拉克： “……不论你是否相信，现在我都只能为你们而战了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "...Whether you believe it or not, now I can only fight for you."

label: LDC:B029
value: 「林德拉克： “请带我去符拉迪沃斯托克机场。我们必须快点离开这个地方。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Please take me to Vladivostok Airport. We must leave this place quickly."

label: LDC:B030
value: 任务目标 - 护送林德拉克前往机场。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort Rynderack to the airport.

label: LDC:B031
value: 提示 - 林德拉克的装甲已经装备了核生化防护层，不再受辐射或者毒雾的影响。
translated: Hint - Rynderack has been equipped with nuclear battlesuit. He will not be affected by radiation or poisonous mist.

label: LDC:B032
value: 「清芷： “林德拉克，我记得我们的特工天枢和你有过联系……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Rynderack, I remember that our agent Tianshu had contact with you..."

label: LDC:B033
value: 「林德拉克： “是的。如果让他为你说明一下情况，那是最好的了。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Yes. It would be best if you let him explain the situation to you."

label: LDC:B034
value: 「清芷： “唉……可惜不会再有机会了吧。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Oh...it's a pity that I won't have another chance."

label: LDC:B035
value: 「清芷： “你的下一步计划如何？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "What's your next plan?"

label: LDC:B036
value: 「林德拉克： “我会从这里乘坐直升机前往澳门。那里有需要我的战斗。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I'll take a helicopter from here to Macau. There are battle out there that need me."

label: LDC:B037
value: 丧失关键部队 - 林德拉克阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Rynderack is killed, mission failed.

label: LDC:B038
value: 突击小队全灭，任务失败。
translated: The assault team was wiped out, mission failed.

label: LDC:B039
value: 「林德拉克： “待会在飞往澳门的航程中，我会把我所知道的一切向你说明。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I will explain everything to you later on the flight to Macau."

label: LDC:C017
value: 提示 - 天子仁将军的部队正在进攻湾仔的心灵信标。
translated: Hint - General Tianziren's troops are attacking the Psychic Beacon in Wan Chai.

label: LDC:C018
value: 「天子仁： “拿出干劲来，年轻人！”」
translated: Tianziren: "Show up your energy, young man!"

label: LDC:C019
value: 「天子仁： “听说如果不把这些玩意都及时摧毁的话，我们可就全都完蛋了，对吧？”」
translated: Tianziren: "If these things are not destroyed in time, we are all doomed, right?"

label: LDC:C020
value: 「天子仁： “不过不必太过紧张。我会出动空军帮助你分担一部分压力。”」
translated: Tianziren: "But don't be too nervous. I will help you out with air support."

label: LDC:C021
value: 提示 - 摧毁了一座心灵信标。过载预估时间延后8分钟。
translated: Hint - For each Psychic Beacon destroyed, the overload time will extend by 8 minutes.

label: LDC:C022
value: 所有心灵信标都已经被摧毁。
translated: All psychic beacons have been destroyed.

label: LDC:C023
value: 提示 - 没被心灵控制的澳门守备部队正在氹仔重新集结。他们由你来指挥。
translated: Hint - The Macau garrison troops that was not mind-controlled is regrouping in Taipa. They are under your command

label: LDC:B040
value: 提示 - 安磊将军的潜艇部队已经到达。
translated: Hint - General Anlei's submarine fleet has arrived.

label: LDC:B041
value: 「安磊： “水路交给我，你只需要专心攻击敌人的陆地防御即可。”」
translated: Anlei: "Leave the waterway to me, you only need to focus on attacking the enemy's land defenses."

label: LDC:B042
value: 「安磊： “我的舰队主力已经到达。”」
translated: Anlei: "My main fleet has arrived."

label: LDC:B043
value: 「安磊： “同志，你这是杀红眼了吗！你他娘的打的是友军！！”」
translated: Anlei: "Comrades, are you crazy! You're f**king fighting friendly forces!!"

label: LDC:D017
value: 一座快中子注入装置已经被引爆。
translated: A fast neutron reactor has been detonated.

label: LDC:D018
value: 丧失关键目标 - 尤里占领了一座快中子注入装置，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Yuri captures a fast neutron reactor, mission failed.

label: LDC:D019
value: 丧失关键目标 - 在转化足够量的钚之前损失了全部快中子注入装置，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - All fast neutron reactors were lost before enough plutonium could be produced, mission failed.

label: LDC:D020
value: 「清芷： “绵阳最后的精英守备部队已经抵达，连同一辆基地车。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Mianyang's last elite garrison has arrived, along with a MCV."

label: LDC:D021
value: 「清芷： “从此以后你只能孤军奋战，不再会有支援了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "From now on you will fight alone, there will no longer be support."

label: LDC:B044
value: 「林德拉克： “我想我们应该避开防守严密的港口和基地。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I think we should avoid the heavily defended ports and bases."

label: LDC:D022
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余11）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 11 remaining).

label: LDC:D023
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余10）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 10 remaining).

label: LDC:D024
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余9）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 9 remaining).

label: LDC:D025
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余8）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 8 remaining).

label: LDC:D026
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余7）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 7 remaining).

label: LDC:D027
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余6）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 6 remaining).

label: LDC:D028
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余5）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 5 remaining).

label: LDC:D029
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余4）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 4 remaining).

label: LDC:D030
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余3）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 3 remaining).

label: LDC:D031
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余2）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 2 remaining).

label: LDC:D032
value: 任务目标 - 保护至少一座快中子注入装置，直到转化足够量的钚（当前剩余1）。
translated: Mission Objective - Protect at least one fast neutron reactor until enough plutonium is produced (currently 1 remaining).

label: LDC:D033
value: 「清芷： “注意，尤里正在试图派遣工程师占领一座快中子注入装置！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Attention, Yuri is trying to capture a fast neutron reactor with engineers!"

label: LDC:D034
value: 「天子仁： “所有还在前线奋勇杀敌的同志们！我还有些话想要讲。”」
translated: Tianziren: "All comrades who are still fighting on the front line! I have something to say."

label: LDC:D035
value: 「天子仁： “这应该是我最后的一次讲话了。希望大家认真听完。”」
translated: Tianziren: "This could be my last speech. I hope you all listen carefully to the end."

label: LDC:D036
value: 「天子仁： “一颗两百万吨TNT当量的核弹头已经在引爆区准备完毕。”」
translated: Tianziren: "A nuclear warhead with an equivalent of 2 mega-ton of TNT has been prepared in the detonation zone."

label: LDC:D037
value: 「天子仁： “我们会引爆这颗弹头，与包围我们的、数十倍于我们的敌人同归于尽。”」
translated: Tianziren: "We will detonate this warhead and die together with the enemies that surround us."

label: LDC:D038
value: 「天子仁： “在这场战争面前，我们付出了巨大的代价。我的儿子，天枢，也包含在内。”」
translated: Tianziren: "In the face of this war, we paid a huge price. My son, Tianshu, included."

label: LDC:D039
value: 「天子仁： “虽然得知消息时悲痛万分，但我早已有了付出更大代价的觉悟。”」
translated: Tianziren: "I was deeply saddened when I heard the news, but I have already realized that I may have to pay a greater price."

label: LDC:D040
value: 「天子仁： “因为，我们会用生命向我们的敌人们证明——”」
translated: Tianziren: "Because, we will prove to our enemies, with our lives——"

label: LDC:D041
value: 「天子仁： “——这是一片永远也无法被征服的土地。”」
translated: Tianziren: "——This is a land that can never be conquered."

label: LDC:C024
value: 「清芷： “首长，我不觉得往我们自己的国土上发射核弹是一件明智之举。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Commander, I don't think it is a wise move to use nukes on our own land."

label: LDC:C025
value: 「清芷： “但如果情况危急到必须要这么做，那就不要在意了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "But if the situation is critical, then don't worry about it."

label: LDC:C026
value: 心灵信标已被摧毁。我们重新获得了对基地的控制权。
translated: The psychic beacon has been destroyed. We regained control of the base.

label: LDC:C027
value: 心灵信标过载预估时间
translated: Psychic Beacon Overload Estimated Time

label: LDC:C028
value: 心灵信标过载成功，任务失败。
translated: The psychic beacon overload was successful, mission failed.

label: LDC:C029
value: 全民动员状态开启，我们已经可以通过征召民兵来加快步兵训练速度。
translated: With the national mobilization, we can speed up infantry training by recruiting militia.

label: LDC:C030
value: 「征召中心」会提升训练步兵的价格，但是可以使我们一次训练多名步兵。
translated: "Recruitment Center" will increase the cost of training infantry, but also allow us to train multiple infantry units at once.

label: LDC:C031
value: 提示 - 在海关附近集结的珠江守备舰队已经脱离心灵控制，供您差遣。
translated: Hint - The Pearl River fleet near the customs has been released from mind control.

label: LDC:DE002
value: 「清芷： “我们已经成功解码了天枢身上的芯片内的信息。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We have successfully decoded the information on Tianshu's chip."

label: LDC:DE003
value: 「清芷： “首长，请重温他留下的这段行动记录，我想这能解答我们很多疑惑。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Commander, please review this operation record he left. I think this can answer many of our questions."

label: LDC:DE004
value: 正在加载行动记录，请稍候……
translated: Loading operation records, please wait...

label: LDC:DE005
translated: February 22, 1989.

label: LDC:DE006
value: 中国，兰州。
translated: Lanzhou, China.

label: LDC:DE007
value: 「天枢： “如果我的情报没有错，在兰州也有一座购买来的心灵信标。”」
translated: Tianshu: "If my intel is correct, there is also a purchased psychic beacon in Lanzhou."

label: LDC:DE008
value: 「天枢： “比起草率的摧毁它，我觉得骇入它并获得情报是更加有价值的。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Rather than destroying it, I think it is more valuable to hack it to obtain intelligence."

label: LDC:DE009
value: 「天枢： “尤里为什么会把心灵信标卖给我们？而我们又为什么要买它？”」
translated: Tianshu: "Why did Yuri sell the psychic beacon to us? And why should we buy it?"

label: LDC:DE010
value: 「天枢： “我实在搞不懂这又是什么奇怪的交易了。还是亲自去调查一下吧。对吧，毛毛？”」
translated: Tianshu: "I just don't get it. It's better to investigate it ourselves. Right, Maomao?"

label: LDC:DE011
value: 任务目标A - 骇入雷达站A。
translated: Mission Objective A - Hack Radar Station A.

label: LDC:DE012
value: 任务目标B - 骇入雷达站B。
translated: Mission Objective B - Hack Radar Station B.

label: LDC:DE013
value: 任务目标 - 骇入心灵信标。
translated: Mission Objective - Hack the Psychic Beacon.

label: LDC:DE014
value: 任务目标 - 让天枢安全到达撤离点。
translated: Mission Objective - Let Tianshu reach the extraction point safely.

label: LDC:DE015
value: 「天枢： “我可以绕开门口的守卫，靠近并骇入那座哨戒炮，使它为我所用。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I can bypass the guard at the door, get close to, and hack into the sentry gun."

label: LDC:DE016
value: 「天枢： “该死……他们正在启动网络安全系统来检测黑客入侵。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Damn... They are activating the security system to detect hacking."

label: LDC:DE017
value: 「天枢： “安全系统会定时对所有建筑物进行自检，一旦被扫描到，我就暴露了。”」
translated: Tianshu: "The security system will scan all buildings periodically. Once detected, I will be exposed."

label: LDC:DE018
value: 「天枢： “我得在下一次系统检查前，处理掉所有被骇入的建筑物，以免被发现。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I have to sell (or destroy) all the hacked buildings before the next system scan to avoid exposure."

label: LDC:DE019
value: 下一次安全系统自检扫描
translated: Next security system scan

label: LDC:DE020
value: 注意 - 安全系统自检扫描还有30秒！
translated: Note - The security system scan will initiate in 30 seconds!

label: LDC:DE021
value: 安全系统自检完毕，没有发现黑客程序。
translated: The security system scan was completed. No hacker program was found.

label: LDC:DE022
value: 警告 - 安全系统自检发现黑客程序！
translated: Warning - Security system finds a hacker program!

label: LDC:DE023
value: 警告 - 黑客程序已经隔离，正在追溯来源……
translated: Warning - The hacker program has been isolated. Tracing source...

label: LDC:DE024
value: 「天枢： “我的渗透行动已经暴露了。他们应该很快会来追杀我。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I am exposed. They will coming after me soon."

label: Name:MAOMAO
value: 毛毛
translated: MaoMao

label: Name:NAPCIS
value: 心灵探测器
translated: Psychic Sensor

label: Name:PARARDLK
value: 部署林德拉克
translated: Deploy Rynderack

label: LDC:C032
value: 已成功肃清尤里在澳门的主要部队。
translated: Yuri's forces in Macau have been successfully eliminated.

label: LDC:C033
value: 我们失去了全部的部队，任务失败。
translated: We lost all our troops, mission failed.

label: LDC:C034
value: 「清芷： “干的漂亮。接下来我们要把尤里彻底赶出澳门。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Great job. Next we have to kick Yuri out of Macau."

label: LDC:C035
value: 任务目标 - 消灭澳门的全部尤里势力。
translated: Mission Objective - Eliminate all Yuri forces in Macau.

label: LDC:C036
value: 「清芷： “我们可以训练更多的心灵部队来对付尤里，以其人之道还治其人之身。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We can train more psychic troops to deal with Yuri."

label: LDC:A037
value: 「清芷： “什么，你让后勤发射了那么多巡航导弹，就为了炸一座电话亭？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "What, you asked for cruise missiles just to blow up a phone booth?"

label: LDC:A038
value: 「天权： “……嘛，我就是想试试看嘛……”」
translated: Tianquan: "...Well, I just want to give it a try..."

label: LDC:G002
value: 「尤里： “快结束了，就快要结束了！”」
translated: Yuri: "It's almost over, it's almost over!"

label: LDC:G003
value: 「尤里： “在你们浪费时间的时候，命运之瞳已经得到了充分的升级，现在它已经无人可挡。”」
translated: Yuri: "While you were wasting time, the Eye of Fate has been fully upgraded, and now it is unstoppable."

label: LDC:G004
value: 「尤里： “你们会发起徒劳无功的进攻，然后殒命于此。这是我的预言。”」
translated: Yuri: "You will launch a futile attack and die here. This is my prediction."

label: LDC:G005
value: 「清芷： “请稍候，巡航导弹正在锁定目标，准备清理登陆区域。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Please stand by, cruise missiles are locking on the target, preparing to clear the landing area."

label: LDC:G006
value: 我们的登陆部队已经到达。
translated: Our landing force has arrived.

label: LDC:G007
value: 「天权： “来吧，战斗要开始了！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Come on, the battle is about to begin!"

label: LDC:G008
value: 天权的载具无法使用了。在战车工厂中可以重新生产他的载具。
translated: Tianquan's vehicle is beyond repair. It can be rebuild in the War Factory.

label: LDC:G009
value: 林德拉克已经做好通过空降进入战场的准备了。
translated: Rynderack was ready to enter the battlefield via airborne.

label: LDC:G010
value: 「林德拉克： “就是这样，伙计！我会马上空降到你需要的地方去。”」
translated: Rynderack: "That's it! I'll land right where you need me."

label: LDC:G011
value: 林德拉克受了伤。我们会送他去治疗。稍后他就可以返回前线。
translated: Rynderack was injured. We will treat him. He will return to the frontline later.

label: LDC:G012
value: 「清芷： “传感器显示，命运之瞳周围聚集着极高的心灵能量。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Sensors show that extremely high psychic energy gathered around the Eye of Fate."

label: LDC:G013
value: 「清芷： “我不清楚这座装置的具体作用，但总之，很危险……”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I don't know the purpose of this device, but it is very dangerous..."

label: LDC:G014
value: 「天权： “管它什么作用……反正尤里在里面待着，把它炸了就完事了！”」
translated: Tianquan: "Whatever its purpose... Yuri is staying inside anyway, just blow it up and that's it!"

label: LDC:G015
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁命运之瞳。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy the Eye of Fate.

label: Name:UAV
value: 无人机侦查
translated: Drone Reconnaissance

label: LDC:C037
value: 「尤里： “哦，你们就把希望寄托在那可悲的原子武器上面？”」
translated: Yuri: "Oh, you just place hope on that pathetic nuclear weapon?"

label: LDC:C038
value: 「尤里： “真是可笑。我会让你们见识一下心灵的力量究竟有多么强大。”」
translated: Yuri: "That's ridiculous. I will show you how powerful the mind really is."

label: LDC:C039
value: 「清芷： “该死，尤里似乎加强了心灵信标之间的数据传输备份。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Damn it, Yuri seems to have strengthened the data transmission backups between psychic beacons."

label: LDC:C040
value: 「清芷： “我们破坏每座心灵信标能争取的时间，可能会低于之前的估计。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The time we can buy by destroying each psychic beacon may be lower than previously estimated."

label: LDC:C041
value: 提示 - 摧毁了一座心灵信标。过载预估时间延后6分钟。
translated: Hint - Destroy a Psychic Beacon to extend the overload time by 6 minutes.

label: LDC:D042
value: 已经转化了足够当量的钚-239。
translated: A sufficient amount of plutonium-239 has been produced.

label: LDC:D043
value: 「天子仁： “全体注意！销毁所有快中子注入装置！！准备引爆！！！”」
translated: Tianziren: "All attention! Destroy all fast neutron reactor! Fire in the hole!"

label: LDC:DE025
value: 「天枢： “首先，我得想办法混过桥头那座前哨站。”」
translated: Tianshu: "First, I have to find a way to get past the outpost at the bridge."

label: LDC:DE026
value: 「天枢： “这里就是黄河吗……之前都是只能从视频资料里看到。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Is this the Yellow River... I only saw it from videos before."

label: LDC:DE027
value: 「天枢： “糟糕，我的骇入只能改变建筑物内部的程序，没法应付里面的守卫。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Oops, I can only hack the programs inside buildings, but I can't deal with the garrison."

label: LDC:DE028
value: 「天枢： “毛毛，看你的了！”」
translated: Tianshu: "Maomao, it's your turn!"

label: LDC:DE029
value: 「天枢： “等这一仗打完了，我一定会回来好好转转。”」
translated: Tianshu: "When this battle is over, I will definitely come back and have a good time."

label: LDC:DE030
value: 「天枢： “我得利用我的静滞射线武器，分散、勾引桥上的巡逻部队，并逐一击破。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I have to use my immobilization ray to defeat patrols on the bridge one by one. ""

label: LDC:DE031
value: 「天枢： “我的探测无人机已经准备好。它能帮助我获得更宽阔的视野。”」
translated: Tianshu: "My reconnaissance drone is ready. It helps me gain a broader perspective."

label: LDC:DE032
value: 「天枢： “我需要先从这两座雷达站中获取情报，找到心灵信标的位置。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I need intels from these two radar towers to locate the psychic beacon."

label: LDC:DE033
value: 已成功骇入一座雷达站。
translated: A radar tower has been successfully hacked.

label: LDC:DE034
value: 丧失关键部队 - 天枢阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Tianshu was killed, mission failed.

label: LDC:DE035
value: 毛毛倒下了。
translated: Maomao has fallen.

label: LDC:DE036
value: 安全系统自检中……
translated: Security system scanning...

label: Name:OIP
value: 数据中心
translated: Datacenter

label: LDC:DE037
value: 「天枢： “得到了位置的一个坐标。我还得骇入另一座雷达来找到另一个坐标。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I got a coordinate. I still have to hack the other radar."

label: LDC:DE038
value: 「天枢： “为什么这里会有一座心灵探测器？心灵探测器的技术也被购买了吗？”」
translated: Tianshu: "Why is there a psychic radar here? Is this technology also purchased?"

label: LDC:DE039
value: 已成功骇入心灵信标。
translated: The psychic beacon has been successfully hacked.

label: LDC:DE040
value: 「天枢： “这下成功了。我可要把事情的来龙去脉好好的理清楚。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Great. I want to figure out everything about the matter."

label: LDC:DE041
value: 情报解密中……
translated: Decrypting intelligence...

label: LDC:DE042
value: 「天枢： “‘红莲花计划’，我们和尤里高度机密的合作计划。”」
translated: Tianshu: "'Project Red Lotus', our secretive cooperation with Yuri."

label: LDC:DE043
value: 「天枢： “尤里一直欺骗我们说心灵信标是一种宣传工具，因此政府方面欣然同意合作，然而事实远非如此……”」
translated: Tianshu: "Yuri is deceiving us that the psychic beacon is a propaganda tool, but the truth is far from that..."

label: LDC:DE044
value: 「天枢： “糟糕，我的行动似乎已经暴露了。我得赶快逃离这里。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Oops, this operation seem to be exposed. I need to get out of here quickly."

label: LDC:DE045
value: 「天枢： “我得前往这里的运输船旁边，通过水路撤离。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I have to go to the amphibious transport here and evacuate through water."

label: LDC:DE046
value: 「天枢： “必须将事情的真相尽快传达到军方高层。希望还来得及。”」
translated: Tianshu: "The truth must be passed to the military high commands ASAP. Hopefully it's not too late."

label: LDC:DE047
value: 「天枢： “兰州，有缘再会。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Lanzhou, see you later should the fate permit."

label: LDC:DE048
value: 「天枢： “心灵信标的位置已经确定。接下来我要骇入它获得更多的情报……”」
translated: Tianshu: "I got the location of the psychic beacon. Next, I will hack into it to get more intel..."

label: LDC:DE049
value: 坐标已获取，正在分析地图信息……
translated: Coordinates acquired. Analyzing the map information...

label: LDC:DE050
value: 撤离运输艇
translated: Evacuation Amphibious Transport

label: LDC:DE051
value: 「天枢： “毛毛有着精湛的战斗技巧，应该不怕其他军犬的扑咬，甚至让它们望而却步。”」
translated: Tianshu: "Maomao has superb fighting skills. He should not fear other dogs, or even scare them away."

label: LDC:DE052
value: 「天枢： “敌人的追击部队正在赶来，我得赶紧逃跑了。剩下的资料以后慢慢看。”」
translated: Tianshu: "I have to leave now before the enemy caught up. I'll look at the rest of the documents later."

label: LDC:DE053
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 雷达在被骇入前被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - the radar was destroyed before being hacked, mission failed.

label: LDC:DE054
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 心灵信标在被骇入前被毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - the psychic beacon was destroyed before being hacked, mission failed.

label: LDC:D044
value: 「清芷： “注意！大批尤里部队正在从西边向我们的防线进攻！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Attention! A large number of Yuri troops are attacking our defense line from the west!"

label: LDC:D045
value: 「清芷： “注意！尤里部队正在以优势兵力，突破我们西北方向的防线！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Attention! Yuri's troops are breaking through our defense at northwest!"

label: LDC:D046
value: 「清芷： “这是科技机器商店。占领它，会使所有我方的装甲部队得到自动修理。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "This is machine shop. Capturing it will automatically repair all our armored units."

label: LDC:D047
value: 「天子仁： “什么？这么快就来了？”」
translated: Tianziren: "What? They are already here!?"

label: LDC:D048
value: 「清芷： “注意，尤里在调集被心灵控制的部队，参与对绵阳的合围！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Attention, Yuri is mobilizing mind-controlled troops in the siege of Mianyang!"

label: LDC:E002
value: 「清芷： “先前在釜山的战斗中，我们已经成功夺取尤里‘最终意志’计划的一批设备。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "In the previous battle in Pusan, we have successfully captured some equipment for Yuri's plan - "The Final Spirit"."

label: LDC:E003
value: 「清芷： “这些设备已经装船，但尤里一定会不惜一切代价阻止我们将设备运走的。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "These equipment have been loaded onto cargo ships. Yuri will attempt to stop us at all costs."

label: LDC:E004
value: 「清芷： “这边需要你的增援，天权。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We need your reinforcements here, Tianquan."

label: LDC:E005
value: 「天权： “交给我吧，我会带领部队护送这些货轮安全的离开。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Leave it to me. I will escort these cargo ships to leave safely."

label: LDC:E006
value: 任务目标 - 护送至少一艘货轮到撤离点。
translated: Mission Objective - Escort at least one cargo ship to the extraction point.

label: LDC:D049
value: 「天子仁： “该死……他们终于破解了我们导弹发射井的密码！”」
translated: Tianziren: "Damn... They cracked the code of our missile silo!"

label: LDC:D050
value: 「天子仁： “他们正在使用所有被占领的导弹井向我们发射导弹！立刻准备防空力量！”」
translated: Tianziren: "They are firing missiles at us! Prepare air defense forces immediately!"

label: LDY:DE021
value: 教徒，盟军的造船厂也在我们需要摧毁的目标之列。不要遗漏它们。
translated: Proselytes, we also need to destroy the Allied shipyards. Don't miss them.

label: LDC:D051
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（10x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (10x speed)

label: LDC:D052
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（9x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (9x speed)

label: LDC:D053
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（8x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (8x speed)

label: LDC:D054
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（7x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (7x speed)

label: LDC:D055
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（6x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (6x speed)

label: LDC:D056
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（5x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (5x speed)

label: LDC:D057
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（4x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (4x speed)

label: LDC:D058
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（3x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (3x speed)

label: LDC:D059
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（2x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (2x speed)

label: LDC:D060
value: 钚-239转化剩余进度（1x倍速）
translated: Plutonium-239 production remaining progress (1x speed)

label: LDC:F002
value: 山崎重工 - 泰坦组装中心
translated: Yamazaki Heavy Industries - Titan Assembly Center

label: LDC:F003
value: 泰坦无人机甲（量产型号）
translated: Titan Autonomous Mech (mass production model)

label: LDC:F004
value: 「清芷： “十分抱歉让你们二位急匆匆的赶来，但确实这里有紧急状况需要处理。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I'm sorry to have you two rush here. There is an emergency."

label: LDC:F005
value: 「清芷： “尤里正利用山崎重工的设备，对欧盟研发的重型机甲‘泰坦机甲’进行量产。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Yuri is mass-producing 'Titan' heavy mech developed by the European Union at Yamazaki Heavy Industries."

label: LDC:F006
value: 「清芷： “在它强大的攻势面前，我们的坦克部队支撑不了多久。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Faced its supreme firepower, our tanks won't last for very long."

label: LDC:F007
value: 「清芷： “坏消息是，这些机甲都是远程遥控的，我们没法通过心控技术进行反制。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The bad news is that these mechs are remotely controlled, and we can't counter them through mind control."

label: LDC:F008
value: 「清芷： “但好消息是，只要我们摧毁了控制中心，这些机甲就会全部瘫痪。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "But the good news is that all these mechs will be offline if we destroyed the control centers."

label: LDC:F009
value: 「天权： “那好，就由我来引导巡航导弹炸掉那些控制中心。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Well, let me guide the cruise missiles to blow up those control centers."

label: LDC:F010
value: 「清芷： “我们对这片区域还没进行完全的地形测绘。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We have not yet mapped this area."

label: LDC:F011
value: 「清芷： “需要雷达站提供雷达信息，天权才能成功的引导巡航导弹击中目标。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Radar tower is required for Tianquan's guided cruise missile to hit the target."

label: LDC:F012
value: 「林德拉克： “终于轮到我们出场了！”」
translated: Rynderack: "Finally, it's our turn!"

label: LDC:F013
value: 任务目标 - 摧毁所有控制中心。
translated: Mission Objective - Destroy all robot control centers.

label: LDC:F014
value: 任务目标 - 林德拉克和天权必须存活。
translated: Mission Objective - Keep Rynderack and Tianquan alive.

label: LDC:F015
value: 注意 - 只有在有雷达信息的时候，天权引导的巡航导弹才会准确的命中目标。
translated: Note - Tianquan's guided cruise missiles will accurately hit the target only when radar is available.

label: LDC:F016
value: 提示 - 林德拉克和天权都完全无法与泰坦机甲正面对抗，你可能需要大量重型坦克才能一战。
translated: Hint - Rynderack and Tianquan are unable to fight the Titan directly. You may need lots of heavy tanks to fight them.

label: LDC:F017
value: 「清芷： “注意！更多的泰坦机甲正在向我们基地接近！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Attention! More Titans are approaching our base!"

label: LDC:F018
value: 丧失关键单位 - 林德拉克阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Rynderack is killed, mission failed.

label: LDC:F019
value: 丧失关键单位 - 天权阵亡，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - Tianquan is killed, mission failed.

label: LDC:F020
value: 注意 - 已失去雷达信息，天权引导的巡航导弹无法准确命中。
translated: Attention - Radar lost, Tianquan's the guided cruise missile cannot hit accurately.

label: LDC:F021
value: 注意 - 已重新获得雷达信息，天权引导巡航导弹恢复正常。
translated: Attention - Radar re-acquired, Tianquan's guided cruise missiles are back to normal.

label: LDC:F022
value: 「林德拉克： “来自苏联的工业工厂已经加入军备。它可以降低装甲部队的造价。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Industrial Plant is available now. It can reduce the cost of armored units."

label: LDC:F023
value: 已摧毁一座控制中心。
translated: A control center has been destroyed.

label: LDC:F024
value: 已摧毁全部控制中心。所有泰坦机甲陷入瘫痪状态。
translated: All control centers have been destroyed. All Titans are offline.

label: LDC:F025
value: 「林德拉克： “这下好了，机甲全都变成靶子了！趁这个机会，把敌人打回老家吧。”」
translated: Rynderack: "That's it, all Titans are disabled! Take this opportunity to fight back."

label: LDC:F026
value: 任务目标 - 占领尤里的建造厂。
translated: Mission Objective - Capture Yuri's construction yard.

label: LDC:F027
value: 「清芷： “我们最好先不要招惹这边的尤里基地，先专注于解决泰坦机甲的威胁。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We'd better not provoke that Yuri base yet. We should focus on dealing with the threat of Titan first."

label: LDC:F028
value: 「清芷： “好了，麻烦的事情都解决完了，接下来该去北极解决尤里了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Okay, we are done sorting things out here. Now it's time to deal with Yuri in the North Pole."

label: LDC:F029
value: 「天权： “是的，审判时刻到了。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Sure, the day of judgment has arrived."

label: LDC:F030
value: 「林德拉克： “算我一份。”」
translated: Rynderack: "Count me in."

label: LDC:F031
value: 「清芷： “这里也有一座尤里基地。占领它，也许我们就能找到真相的最后一块拼图。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "There is another Yuri constrution yard here. Capture it and we might find the final piece of the puzzle."

label: LDC:F032
value: 「清芷： “基地已经占领。正在回传数据。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The construction yard has been captured. Transmitting data."

label: LDC:F033
value: 丧失关键建筑 - 尤里基地被摧毁，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST - Yuri construction yard was destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDC:F034
value: 警告 - 你的任务是占领尤里建造厂，而不是摧毁，摧毁将导致任务失败！
translated: Warning - You need to capture the Yuri construction yard, not to destroy it. Mission will fail should they be destroyed!

label: LDC:F035
value: 「天权： “我们需要更多的雌鹿直升机来进行转移。”」
translated: Tianquan: "We need more Hind helicopters for transfers."

label: LDC:F036
value: 「天权： “一座巨炮？我可以轻松的在它的射程外，引导巡航导弹干掉它。”」
translated: Tianquan: "A grand cannon? I can easily take it out using guided cruise missiles outside of its range."

label: LDC:F037
value: 「清芷： “现在攻击这座基地完全是徒劳的，我们必须尽快先摧毁控制中心！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It is futile to assult this base now. We must destroy the control centers ASAP!"

label: LDC:F038
value: 「清芷： “日本人受到的心灵控制已经被解除，现在他们会和我们并肩作战。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The Japanese has been released from mind-control. They will fight alongside us."

label: LDC:F039
value: 「清芷： “我们在这里检测到一座心灵信标。摧毁它，说不定就能解除日本人受到的心灵控制。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We detected a psychic beacon here. Destroying it might release the Japanese from mind control."

label: LDC:F040
value: 提示 - 摧毁心灵信标，解除日本部队受到的心灵控制。
translated: Hint - Destroy the Psychic Beacon to release the Japanese troops from mind-control.

label: LDC:F041
value: 「清芷： “最好不要完全断绝拯救这些被心灵控制的日本人的希望。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It's best not to give up on saving these mind-controlled Japanese."

label: LDC:F042
value: 「清芷： “按理来说，应该有一座心灵信标在影响着他们，可是在哪里呢？”」
translated: Qingzhi: "In theory, there should be a psychic beacon affecting them, but where is it?"

label: LDC:F043
value: 「清芷： “每次出厂的泰坦机甲变多了。按照这种趋势，我们要承担越来越大的防守压力。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "More Titans are being build each time. Following this trend, it will be harder for us to hold."

label: LDC:F044
value: 「天权： “看来我和林德拉克得行动的再快些了。”」
translated: Tianquan: "It seems like Rynderack and I have to move faster."

label: LDC:E007
value: 警告 - 检测到雷鸣潜艇！
translated: Warning - Boomer Submarines Detected!

label: LDC:E008
value: 「清芷： “我们已经通过逆向工程成功复刻了尤里的心灵探测技术。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We have successfully reverse engineered Yuri's psychic sensing technology."

label: LDC:E009
value: 「清芷： “在它的帮助下，我们会更容易发现水下敌人潜艇的动向。。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "With its help, we can track the movements of enemy submarines."

label: LDC:E010
value: 「清芷： “我们已经派出了一些潜艇潜伏在釜山港口外作为接应。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We have sent some submarines to the outside the Pusan port, just in case."

label: LDC:E011
value: 「清芷： “你只需要把货轮护送到撤离点，接下来的护航任务就由他们接手了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "You only need to escort cargo ships to the evacuation point. They will take care of the rest of the escort duty."

label: LDC:E012
value: 「林德拉克： “咳咳，听得到吗？”」
translated: Rynderack: "Ahem, can you hear me?"

label: LDC:E013
value: 「林德拉克： “我已经把‘铁幕装置’的技术资料传输给你们。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I have transmitted the technical documents of the 'Iron Curtain Device' to you."

label: LDC:E014
value: 「林德拉克： “这玩意能让装甲部队或者战舰进入完全无敌的状态一段时间，应该可以帮上大忙。”」
translated: Rynderack: "This device can make armored troops or warships invincible for a while, which should be of great help."

label: LDC:E015
value: 「天权： “这座城市真是受到了可怕的破坏……”」
translated: Tianquan: "This city has been seriously damaged..."

label: LDC:E016
value: 「清芷： “港口中散落着很多被心灵控制的韩国军队。解救他们。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "There are many mind-controlled Korean troops scattered in the port. Rescue them."

label: LDC:E017
value: 「清芷： “另外，如果能重新夺回釜山机场的话，我们就能建造一些战机支援战斗。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "In addition, if we can capture Pusan Airport, we can build some airplanes to support the battle."

label: LDC:E018
value: 天权受到了重伤。我们会把他接回去治疗，但恐怕他要缺席这场战斗了。
translated: Tianquan was seriously injured. We will take him back for treatment, but he will miss the rest of this battle.

label: LDC:E019
value: 提示 - 天权可以搭乘雌鹿运输直升机，更加灵活的引导巡航导弹。
translated: Hint - Tianquan can ride on the Hind transport helicopter to guide cruise missiles more flexibly.

label: LDC:E020
value: 「清芷： “那是什么？……好像是尤里的复制人，他们正在从水面上飘过来！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "What is that? ...seems to be Yuri's clones. They are floating on the water!"

label: LDC:E021
value: 有1艘货轮被击沉，还剩2艘。
translated: A cargo ships was sunk. There are two left.

label: LDC:E022
value: 有2艘货轮被击沉，还剩最后1艘。
translated: Two cargo ships were sunk. There is only one left.

label: LDC:E023
value: 丧失关键单位 - 所有货轮都被击沉，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - All cargo ships are sunk, mission failed.

label: LDC:E024
value: 已经成功护送一艘货轮到达集结点。
translated: A cargo ship has been successfully escorted to the assembly point.

label: LDC:E025
value: 护送任务已经结束，护卫队准备撤离。
translated: Escort completed. Escort team, preparing to evacuate.

label: LDC:E026
value: 「清芷： “我会召集更多的部队前往釜山港，参与对尤里部队的合围。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "I will assemble more troops to Pusan Port to participate in this operation against Yuri."

label: LDC:E027
value: 「清芷： “援军已抵达。让我们彻底摧毁尤里的基地吧。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Reinforcements have arrived. Let's destroy Yuri's base."

label: LDC:E028
value: 任务目标 - 消灭此地区的尤里势力。
translated: Mission Objective - Eliminate Yuri's forces in this area.

label: LDC:E029
value: 「天权： “也顺便解决掉釜山的尤里势力吧，我可不希望我们在远征时被他们背后捅一刀。”」
translated: Tianquan: "Let's also eliminate Yuri's forces in Pusan. I don't want to be stabbed in the back during the expedition."

label: LDC:E030
value: 尤里在釜山的主要势力已经肃清。
translated: Yuri's forces in Pusan have been eliminated.

label: LDC:E031
value: 解救了韩国军队的战列舰。现在它们会为你所用。
translated: Korean battleships rescued. Now they are available under your command.

label: LDC:E032
value: 解救了韩国军队的狙击手。他们可以远距离狙杀敌人步兵。
translated: Korean snipers rescued. They can snipe enemy infantry from a distance.

label: LDC:E033
value: 修复了韩国军队的机场。现在你可以生产黑鹰战机用于对地轰炸。
translated: Koeran Airport repaired. Now you can produce Black Eagle for bombing.

label: LDC:E034
value: 「清芷： “敌人已经没法进行有组织的抵抗了。我们可以把重心转移到护送货轮上了。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The enemy can no longer resist. We can shift our focus to escorting cargo ships."

label: LDC:G016
value: 「林德拉克： “来自苏联阵营的科技已经全部加入你们的军备库。善用它们！”」
translated: Rynderack: "All technology from the Soviet has all been made available. Make good use of them!"

label: LDC:G017
value: 「米格战机： “米格中队报到！我们会不断向敌人发动轰炸，不要给他们喘息的机会！”」
translated: MiG fighter: "MiG squadron reporting! We will continue to bombard the enemy. Don't give them a chance to catch up!"

label: LDC:G018
value: 「清芷： “等等！我们检测到命运之瞳有异常的行动！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "Wait! We have detected unusual movement in the Eye of Fate!"

label: LDC:G019
value: 「清芷： “命运之瞳正在移动！它径直朝你的基地飞过去了！”」
translated: Qingzhi: "The Eye of Fate is moving! It is flying straight towards your base!"

label: LDC:G020
value: 「尤里： “哼，既然你们已经到了这里，那就让我们看看，命运究竟会选择谁吧。”」
translated: Yuri: "Well, now that you are here, let's see who are in favor of the Fate."

label: LDC:G021
value: 命运之瞳已被摧毁。
translated: The Eye of Fate has been destroyed.

label: LDC:G022
value: 「天权： “终于，结束了……”」
translated: Tianquan: "Finally, it's over..."

label: LDC:G023
value: 「林德拉克： “我一直就在等待这一刻的到来。”」
translated: Rynderack: "I've been waiting for this moment to come."

label: LDC:G024
value: 「天权： “我们为这一切付出的牺牲，多如天上的星斗。”」
translated: Tianquan: "The countless sacrifices we have made are like the stars in the sky."

label: LDC:G025
value: 「天权： “但，我们做了一件多么伟大的事情啊。”」
translated: Tianquan: "But, what a great thing we have accomplished."

label: LDC:G026
value: 「天权： “但，我们做了一件多么伟大的事情啊。对吧，毛毛？”」
translated: Tianquan: "But, what a great thing we have accomplished. Right, Maomao?"

label: LDC:G027
value: 丧失关键单位 - 基地车被毁，无法接收后续任务，任务失败。
translated: CRITICAL UNIT LOST - mobile construction vehicle is destroyed, mission failed.

label: LDC:G028
value: 前往北极的进攻部队全军覆没，任务失败。
translated: The entire force heading to the North Pole was lost, mission failed.

label: LDC:G029
value: 「清芷： “我们对命运之瞳武器系统的了解还不够透彻。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "We don't have a enough intel regarding to the weapon system of the Eye of Fate."

label: LDC:G030
value: 「清芷： “但根据目前的分析，它能够逐渐控制周围一切有心智的事物，并以此回复耐久。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "But based on our analysis, it can mind-control anything controllable around it and regain durability."

label: LDC:G031
value: 「清芷： “它还能向下方释放破坏性的心灵能量，形成猛烈的震爆。”」
translated: Qingzhi: "It can also release destructive psychic energy downwards, forming violent explosions."
